Fausta ella es soltera y tiene 48 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite y galletas.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de zapatos, negocio de venta de regalos, negocio de taller de mecánica y negocio de venta de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank La Pirámide, which is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Member Fausta is 48 years old, single, and has two children. She works in her business, which is a grocery store, selling essential goods such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, and biscuits. She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. This business allows her to provide for her children. Her dream is to expand and improve her grocery store business. She is requesting the loan in order to purchase rice, sugar, milk, oil, and biscuits.

The other members work in different businesses selling shoes, selling gifts, at an auto repair shop, and selling clothing.

Fausta is thankful to everyone who is a part of this dream through this resource, and she is committed to paying all her installments on time.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, oil, and biscuits.

loans.name: Regino

texts.es:
El Sr. Regino labora en un taller mecánico desde hace mas nueve años, su esposa la Sra. María cristina  para apoyar a la economía del hogar labora como empleada domestica. Ellos son originarios del estado de Veracruz y  ya tiene varios años radicando en el estado de Tamaulipas, tienen dos hijos pequeños de los cuales uno de ellos cursa la educación primaria.
Necesitan un ambiente de hogar que le inspire tranquilidad, ya que la apariencia interior no es muy agradable, necesita del acabado interior y por ultimo la pintura. Tanto el Sr. Regino como la Sra. Cristina son personas trabajadoras y honradas que desean darle lo mejor a sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Regino has worked as a mechanic in a workshop for over 9 years. His wife, María Cristina, works as a maid in various homes. Both Regino and María Cristina are from the state of Veracruz, but have been living for some years in the state of Tamaulipas. They have two small children who are in elementary school.

Currently, they need an environment in their home that creates tranquility, as the interior of their house is not very nice. Specifically, they need to finish plastering the interior walls of their home, as well as the interior painting. Both Regino and María Cristina are very hardworking, honorable people who want to provide the best they can for their children.

loans.use: to redo the plaster and paint in the kitchen and bedroom of his family's home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cattle and feed.

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom attend school. She does not look after any dependents. She has been frying snacks for wholesale for the last twenty years, working seven days a week. She also weaves mats.

Justine has requested a loan of UShs 200,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to purchase cooking oil, baking powder and other ingredients in bulk. Her challenges include the high prices of these ingredients, reduced profits during school holidays, scarcity of weaving materials especially in the dry season and unstable market for the mats. 

Justine's dream is to make profits that can result in the improvement of the standard of living of her family.  She joined MCDT because of timely loans. She rents a house without access to electricity or piped water. Her major monthly expenses are school fees and kerosene.

loans.use: To buy more  cooking oil, baking powder, and other ingredients in bulk.

loans.name: Thoa

texts.en: Thoa was born in 1962. Her husband is no longer in this life. She has two children who are both married. Mrs Thoa has been growing rice for a living for 27 years. Each month, she can earn about 1,000,000 VND so it is hard for her to improve her life. This is the first time she has taken part in the credit program of SEDA. She needs a loan amount of 5,014,000 VND so as to invest in raising pigs.

loans.use: to invest in raising pigs

loans.name: Francoise

texts.en: Francoise is 58 years old. She sells foodstuffs and has spent seventeen years in this business. The loan will be used to buy sorghum, maize, and beans to sell. She plans to use the profits to build a house instead of renting.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum, maize, and beans for resale.

loans.name: Deborah

texts.en:
Deborah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with seven children, three of whom are in school. She is not taking care of any additional family members.

She has been operating an eating place at her home for the last three years and working seven days a week. She has no other source of income.

Deborah has requested a loan of 200,000 Uganda shillings (UGX) from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to buy ingredients in bulk and replace utensils that have worn out. Her challenges include seasonality supply of food and associated high prices. Her dream is to be able to find a bigger market for her food so as to make higher profits that will enable her to acquire land. She joined MCDT because the terms of joining are softer than those for other money lending institutions. She rents a house and has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expense is rent.

loans.use: To buy more food stuffs like rice, beans, and Irish potatoes in bulk, and to replace worn-out utensils.

loans.name: Xinh

texts.en: Xinh was born in 1965. She has two children who are in college at present. Her husband is a builder who can earn 3,000,000 Vietnamese dong (VND) per month. Mrs Xinh now is selling condiments in the market, from which she can get about 2,000,000 VND each month. She has been selling these for 10 years. Mrs Xinh has taken part in the credit program of SEDA since 2006 and had a previous loan of VND 7,630,000, which she repaid on time last loan cycle. This time, she would like to have a loan of 8,502,000 VND so that she can raise more money for buying condiments to sell.

loans.use: raise more money for buying condiments to sell

loans.name: Srauv

texts.en:
Srauv (pictured with her loom), age 39, is a weaver and also assists in her husband's farming business. Her husband, Ael, age 49, is a farmer. They live in a village cross the Mekong River, about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh, and they have four children, two sons and two daughters. One is a security guard and the other three attend school, and are in grades 9, 6 and 3.

Srauv is requesting her first loan, in the amount of $1,300, to buy a motorcycle so her son, who is a security guard, can get to work.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike so her son can get to work.

loans.name: Unia

texts.en: Unia now employs one person in her business to assist her, since her stock has increased.

loans.use: to purchase more items like shoes and T-shirts for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente est présidente groupe la Victoire, âgée de 48 ans, mariée, mère de 8 enfants, son mari est chômeur. Son fils ainé a 26 ans et le cadet a 8 ans et tous étudient. Il y a plus 26 ans qu’elle exerce le petit commerce de vente de la bière Primus et Fanta. Elle  commença avec ses fonds propre reçu de son père. Elle vient de réaliser 17 cycles dans le programme de microcrédit de Hekima. Elle expose ses marchandises à son domicile et parfois sur le long de la route. Le grand obstacle est qu’elle vend en monnaie nationale (franc congolais), qui connait parfois de perte de change avec la devise (dollars). Avec ce nouveau crédit, elle va s’approvisionner avec 50 casiers de Primus et Fanta et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans l’investissement. Elle souhaite voir ses enfants finir les études et agrandir son activité. La cliente salut  courageusement l’IMF Hekima pour ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes  exclus de banque classique.
texts.en:
This client, is the president of the group La Victoire. She is 48 years old, married, and a mother of eight children. Her husband is unemployed. Her oldest child is 26 years old, and the youngest is 8. All of the children are students. 

For 26 years, Faida has had a small business selling Primus beer and Fanta. She started with her own funds from her father. She just completed 17 cycles with the Hekima micro-loan program. She displays her merchandise at her home and sometimes on the roadside. Her major obstacle is that she makes her sales in the national currency (Congolese franc), which has sometimes experienced losses in exchange with the dollar. 

With this new loan, Faida is going to stock up with 50 cases of Primus and Fanta. The rest of the money will be used for investments. She wishes to see her children finish their studies and to expand her business. 

This client bravely salutes the microfinance institution Hekima for its actions favoring poor women excluded from traditional banks.

loans.use: to buy 50 cases of Primus and Fanta, etc.

loans.name: Abahujimbaraga No 3 Group

texts.fr:
Aloys fait partie du groupe Abahujimbaraga no 3. Le nom du groupe signifie «les puissances dans le groupe». Il a 32 ans, il est marie avec 3 enfants de 1 an à 9 ans, dont 1  scolarise. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Aloys est agriculteur de riz. C’est son troisième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisant et payer la main d’œuvre pour son agriculture de riz.

Pour faire croitre son agriculture de riz, il planifie d’utiliser des fertilisants sélectionner et sollicite d’autres crédits. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait acheter d’autres champs pour agrandir l’étendue de son agriculture. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer les frais scolaire et médicaux pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Aloys is part of the group Abahujimbaraga no 3. The group's name means "group strengths".  Aloys is 32 years old and married. He has three children, from 1 to 9 years old, of whom one is in school. He has a 6th grade education. 

Aloys is a rice farmer. This loan cycle is his third one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizer and to pay for labor on his rice farm. 

To increase his rice farming, he plans to use select fertilizers and to request more loans. In the next few years, he would like to buy more fields to extend his farming. With the profits, he plans on covering his children's schooling and medical costs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay workers for rice farming

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,ella prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m y tambien la socia sigue haciendo platoz como ceviches en las mañanas y salchipapas en las noches,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como papas,pollos,verduras,salchichas y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues to operate her restaurant business. She prepares breakfast, lunch, and dinner. She works from 8am to 7pm and continues to prepare dishes such as "ceviche" (marinated seafood) in the mornings and "salchipapas" (sausages and potatoes) in the evenings. Through this business, she has been able to help her children get ahead. She dreams of expanding and improving her restaurant, so she is requesting a loan in order to buy ingredients for cooking such as potatoes, chicken, vegetables, sausages, and meat.

The member is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, chicken, vegetables, sausages, and meat.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor on his rice farm

loans.name: Dong

texts.en:
Mrs. Dong was born in 1962. She has two children who are married. Her husband is a builder who can earn about 2,500,000 Viet Nam Dongs (VND) per month.

Dong is a farmer. She has been growing rice for 30 years, from which she can earn about 1,000,000 VND per month.

Dong joined the credit program of SEDA in 2006 and she previously repaid a loan of 7,630,000 VND on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to have a loan of 8,502,000 VND so as to have capital to raise pigs.

loans.use: to have capital to raise pigs.

loans.name: Ernestine

texts.en: Ernestine is 27 years old. She is married to a business man. She owns a store, which she has been running for the past 12 years. The loan will be used to buy more clothes to sell. She expects the profits from the clothing business to be used for buying a motorbike to generate income in a transportation business.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for resale.

loans.name: Thavy

texts.en:
Thavy (in the photo) is 26 years old, and her husband, Sothea, is 23 years old. They have one young daughter. Thavy lives with her parents in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. Her parents operate a pig farming business. 

Thavy stays at home and does house work. The main source of income is her husband’s salary. He is a cobbler in a shoe factory. He wants to run his own business producing shoes, but he does not have the capital to start a business. 

Hence, Thavy decided to request her first loan of $700. With the money, Thavy’s husband will build a shop and buy the necessary materials for producing shoes. 


Furthermore, Thavy will assist in her husband’s business.

loans.use: To help her husband build a shop and buy materials needed in his cobbler business.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María Magdalena tiene 47 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Zaña desde hace 30 años, la zona se encuentra ubicada a más de cuarenta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. 

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio desde hace quince años, allí ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida gracias a la calidad de los productos que ofrece y a la buena atención que brinda. Con los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

María Magdalena desea adquirir más mercadería para poder ampliar su negocio y responder a la demanda con la que cuenta actualmente, por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden con el logro de su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer conocida en su comunidad por su carácter amable y su espíritu de ayuda. María agradece de antemano a las personas que colaborarán con ella.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is 47 years old, married, and has lived with her husband in the district of Zaña for 30 years. This area is located over 40 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo, which is the capital of the region of Lambayeque. 

She has had a small grocery store set up in her residence for 15 years. There she offers her customers a variety of essential goods and groceries. Her business has received a very good response thanks to the quality of her products and her good service. She uses the income she obtains from this work to help her husband cover their daily financial needs.

María Magdalena wants to acquire more merchandise so that she can expand her business and respond to current demand. That is why she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa, in the amount of 2,000 nuevos soles, to help her achieve her goal.

She is well known whithin her community for her kind nature and helpful spirit. María wants to thank in advance all the people who will work with her.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise, so that she can expand her home grocery store.

loans.name: Abahujimbaraga Group

texts.fr:
Fabien fait partie du groupe Abahujimbara A. Le nom du groupe signifie «les puissances dans le groupe». Il a  30 ans, il est marie avec 1 enfant de 4 ans. Son niveau d’éducation est de 4 ans de primaire.

Fabien est agriculteur de riz. C’est son troisième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisant et payer la main d’œuvre pour son agriculture de riz.

Pour faire croitre son agriculture de riz, il planifie d’utiliser des fertilisants sélectionner et sollicite d’autres crédits. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait acheter d’autres champs pour agrandir l’étendue de son agriculture. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer les frais scolaire et médicaux pour son enfant.
texts.en:
Fabien is a member of the group called Abahujimbara A. The name of the group means "strengths in the group". He is 30 years old and married with one child aged four. Fabien's educational level is fourth grade of primary school. 

Fabien grows rice. This is his third loan with ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy fertilizers and pay for labor for his rice crop.  

To make his rice crop grow, he intends to use select fertilizers and ask for other loans. In the coming years, he would like to buy other fields to expand his farmland. With the profit, he expects to pay school fees and medical expenses for his child.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor for his rice crop.

loans.name: Bardhe

texts.en:
Bardhe has six children, ranging from 27 to 11 years old. Three of her children are still attending school. 

She and her husband built a dairy farm some 14 years back. They make cheese, cottage cheese, and yogurt from cows and goats. They have their own animals, but they also buy milk for making dairy products. Their business has been going well so far, thanks to the large clientele in the region that they have been able to establish. 

When asked, Bardhe said, “It would have been very difficult financially to raise six children without having a good source of income from the business. And we think we have had it so far. However, we still cannot afford to repair the dairy farm without help from lenders. This is why we are now applying for a loan, with the previous one, that was used to build the farm, having been paid off in full.” 

Bardhe and her husband seek lenders in this matter.

loans.use: To repair her dairy farm.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en: Solange is married with six children. Her husband is a farmer. She has been selling local drinks for the last 11 years. With this loan, she wants to add more liters of local drinks to sell. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more local drinks to sell.

loans.name: Clarisse

texts.fr: Clarisse est une jeune femme de 34 ans célibataire, mère d'un enfant de 4 ans qui va déjà à l'école. Elle ouvert un sécrétariat qu'elle gère dpuis un an. son activté fonctionne à merveille, mais  elle a juste un manquement qui lui fait perdre beaucoup de clients l'absence de copieur dans sa petite structure. Pourtant c'est une machine qui rapporte beaucoup. Grâce à ce crédit, elle pourraenfin se la procurer ce qui satisfera  sa clientèle en les évitant le déplacement vers d'autres secrétariats voisins et elle aussi. Le bénéfice que lui apportera ce crédit l'aidera à accroitre son activité dans le futur et à s'occuper de son enfant.
texts.en:
Clarisse is a young single woman of 34, the mother of a child of four who already attends school. She has opened a business offering secretarial services and has been running it for one year. Her business is going extremely well, but she has one thing that makes her lose a lot of clients: the absence of a photocopier in her little business. And yet, that is a machine that can earn a lot of money for her. 

Thanks to this loan, she will finally be able to buy one so as to satisfy the needs of her clientele, keeping them from having to go to other neighboring businesses, and help her at the same time. The profit from this loan will help her to grow her little business in the future and to care for her child.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Maria Socorro

texts.es:
María del Socorro tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y cuenta con 3 hijos dependientes. Vive junto a su familia en un ambiente de comprensión y estabilidad. Juntos radican en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, en la región Piura. Los caseríos de la zona tienen un estilo de vida bastante precario y no cuentan con todos los servicios básicos.

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio desde hace diez años, allí ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida gracias a la calidad de los productos que ofrece y a la buena atención que brinda. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores. Estos negocios son dirigidos por ella y su esposo, ambos se turnan de acuerdo a la disponibilidad con la que cuentan. Los ingresos que perciben de estas actividades les sirven para solventar los gastos de su familia.

María desea adquirir mercadería para ampliar su negocio, por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa adquirir golosinas, bebídas, artículos de primera necesidad y abarrotes.

Ella es una mujer bastante trabajadora y con grandes deseos de superación, anteriormente ya ha tenido un crédito financiado a través de Kiva y se encuentra bastante agradecida con las personas que le apoyaron en esa oportunidad. María del Socorro agradece de antemano a las personas que colaborarán con ella en esta ocasión.
texts.en:
María del Socorro is 38 years old, married and has three children.  She lives with her family in an environment of understanding and stability.  They live together in one of the small villages that form part of the agricultural district of Tambograncde, in the Piura region. Life in the villages of the area is quite precarious, and they do not have access to all the basic amenities.

She has run a small general store from her home for ten years.  She offers her customers a range of essential household items and groceries.   
The business is well frequented, thanks to the quality of the products on offer and the good customer service provided.  She also rears and sells young animals. The businesses are run by her and her husband; they take turns according to their availability.  The profit they earn from their businesses allows them to pay for household costs. 

María would like to buy merchandise to expand her business and so has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 new soles, which she plans to use to purchase sweets, drinks, essential household items and groceries.

She is quite a hard working lady with grand dreams of improving her life.  She has previously had a loan financed through Kiva and she is quite grateful to the people who offered her that opportunity. María del Socorro would like to thank in advance the people that will collaborate with her on this occasion.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to expand her grocery store, which she runs from home.

loans.name: Musee

texts.en:
Musee is a 49-year-old mixed-crop farmer, and is married to Stella, who is a farmer. They are blessed with one child aged 8 years. He has been in the farming business for the past six years and has a monthly income of KES 8,900 (Kenyan shillings), which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his fourth loan term with KADET after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Musee will use the loan to purchase seedlings and fertilizer in hopes to export the farm products to other towns. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his child and hopes to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 53 years old, married with two children, and runs a pig-rearing business. He has been in this business for 14 years, earning a monthly income of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES).

This will be his second loan with KADET, and he plans to use it for purchasing feed for the pigs and to build a modern pig shed. He also plans to use the profits from the business to start a training business for pig farmers and he hopes to be a successful farmer in the future.

loans.use: To purchase feed for the pigs and build a modern pig shed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a juicer and utensils like skimmers, colanders, and ladles among others.

loans.name: Kenia

texts.es:
Kenia tiene 20 años de edad, ella es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres quienes la apoyan en todas sus actividades. Ellos residen en un caserío llamado el Pedregal bajo a 15 kilómetros del  en el distrito de Tambogrande  en el departamento de  Piura. La zona no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos y su calidad de vida es bastante limitado.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, y ovinos (ovejas), los cría en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta en el mercado local. Esta actividad  la realiza hace más de tres años durante los cuales ha  podido adquirir experiencia en el rubro y en los ya cuenta con clientela fija.  

Kenia esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la compra de alimentos para el engorde de ganado ovino y aves de corral, de esta manera logrará que su negocio siga creciendo. 

Ella ya ha tenido un crédito financiado a través de Kiva y ha demostrado ser una buena cliente, se encuentra muy agradecida con las personas que colaboraron con ella en aquella oportunidad y agradece de antemano a las personas que colaboren con ella en esta ocasión.
texts.en:
Kenia, 20, is single and lives at home with her parents who support her in everything she does. They live in a village called El Pedregal Bajo at the 15km mark in the district of Tambogrande in the department of Piura. They don't have a lot of basic services and their quality of life is limited. 

She raises and sells small animals, fowl and sheep. She raises them behind her home and when they're big enough she sells them in the local market. She's been doing this for more than three years, and during that time she's gained experience in the field and now has a fixed clientele.

Kenia is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1000 nuevos soles that she plans to use to buy food to fatten her sheep and chickens so that her business can keep growing.

She has had a loan with Kiva before and proved herself a good client. She is very grateful to the people who collaborated with her in the past, and thanks those who will do so on this occasion.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to improve her animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Irvin

texts.es:
Irvin tiene 21años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a sus padres en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito de la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, caracterizado por que sus pobladores se dedican principalmente al cultivo de frutas.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, los cuales cría en un lugar cercano a su casa.  Él los engorda con alimento balanceado y cuando ya están en un estado de desarrollo adecuado, los vende a sus vecinos de la zona y a los comerciantes que llegan al lugar. Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Irvin siempre se esfuerza para poder sacar adelante a su familia y sus esfuerzos siempre tienen resultado, ya que su negocio está creciendo y cuenta con más demanda. Actualmente desea comprar más alimento balanceado para su ganado, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Irvin ya ha tenido un crédito financiado a través de Kiva y le fué muy bien, por lo que se encuentra agradecido con las personas que colaboraron con el en aquella oportunidad. El agradece de antemano a las personas que colaborarán con el en este préstamo.
texts.en:
Irvin is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the Tambogrande district, a district within the province of Piura. This area is characterised by the fact that most of the people in the area cultivate fruit.

Irvin raises sheep, which he keeps near his house. He fattens them with a balanced diet and when they are sufficiently developed, he sells them to his neighbours or to the merchants who come to the area. This work makes it possible for him to help with his family's daily needs.

Irvin always works hard to help his family get ahead, and his efforts always pay off, as his business is growing and in higher demand.  At present, he would like to buy more balanced food for his flock, and for this reason he felt it advisable to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 new soles, which will help him to achieve his goal. 

Irvin has already received a loan through Kiva and it helped him a lot.  As such he is very grateful to the people who collaborated with him on that particular opportunity.  He would like to thank in advance the people who will work with him on this loan.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal food in order to improve his business of rearing and selling animals.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino tiene 45 años de edad, es casado y tiene con seis hijos. Vive junto a su familia en el caserío Lagartera, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Mórrope, zona conocida por tener pobladores humildes y trabajadores. La zona se encuentra en la región Lambayeque

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, el cuenta con diversos corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuando estos han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes de la zona, su especialidad son los cerdos. Adicionalmente trabaja como peón agrícola en los campos de cultivo de la zona y también cuenta con una pequeña parcela en donde siembra menestras y legumbres.

Faustino desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus animales y también fertilizantes para sus sembríos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Faustino is 45 years old, married, and has 6 children. He lives with his family in a farmhouse in Lagartera, a rural area in the Mórrope district. It is known to be an area to be inhabited by humble and hardworking individuals. The area is located in the Lambayeque region.

He sells small livestock for a living. He has various corrals located in the back of his home. When they have grown a certain size he sells them to merchants in the area. He specializes in selling pigs. He also works as a farmworker in the area and has a parcel where he grows lentils and vegetables.

Faustino needs to buy balanced feed for his animals and fertilizer for his crops which is why he requested Edpyme Alternativa a 1000 Peruvian Soles loan.

loans.use: buy balanced feed for his animals and fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Paula

texts.es: Paula es socia del Bancomunal Rumichaka  y tiene 68 años de edad, es madre de 10 hijos mayores, es dueña de una tienda de abarrotes y también se dedica a la compra de vacas para luego vender su carne. Le gusta asistir a las reuniones de su Bancomunal porque gracias a las Capacitaciones que allí recibe aprendió a invertir mejor en su negocio y también aprendió consejos que emplea en su entorno familiar. Su meta es comprar un carro para que así viaje llevando su mercadería y  también traer vacas para venderlas. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de 1 toro par que luego pueda vender su carne.
texts.en:
Paula is a member of the "Bancomunal Rumichaka" communal bank. She is 68 years old, and the mother of ten adult children. She owns a grocery store, and also buys cows in order to later sell their meat. 

She likes to attend the meetings of her communal bank, because thanks to the training she receives there, she has learned to invest better in her business, and has also received advice that she uses in her home environment. 

Her goal is is to buy a car so that she can transport her merchandise, and also bring cows so that she can sell them. She will use the loan she is applying for, in order to buy a bull so that she can then sell the meat.

loans.use: To buy a bull, so that she can then sell the meat.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, comprándose medicamentos para mantener una variedad de vitaminas, carbohidratos, nutrientes, y otros fármacos  para la venta, esto le ayudara a Miguel a ofrecer a su clientela.
El manifiesta haber tenido un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, pues mejoro la disponibilidad de medicamentos en el negocio, que le ayudo para mantener a la clientela, su calidad de vida tambien está mejor.
texts.en:
Miguel is asking for a new loan to invest in his business.  By buying medicines, he can stock a variety of vitamins, analogous carbohydrates, nutrients and other medication to sell, which will help him to offer products to his customers. 

The previous loan appears to have had a positive impact on Miguel, as it improved the availability of medications, which helped him to retain customers, and his quality of life is also better.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, carbohydrates, nutrients.

loans.name: Jose Abdubar

texts.es:
José, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de 1200 plantas de chile, abono y foliares, pues está iniciando la siembra de esta nueva temporada, del que espera tener nuevamente buenos frutos.
Él con su anterior cultivo, logro recoger una buena cosecha que le dejo una buena utilidad, mejorando tambien económicamente junto a su familia, José considera estar superándose con estos préstamos.
texts.en: José is seeking a new loan for the purchase of 1200 chile plants, along with compost and fertilizer. He is starting to plant for the new season, which he hopes will bring an abundant harvest.  With his previous crop he was able to achieve a good harvest, which helped him to improve his family's financial situation.  He believes that these loans are very helpful in this regard.

loans.use: to buy 1200 chile plants, compost and fertilizer.

loans.name: Eteme

texts.fr: Eteme est une femme de 40 ans, veuve, mère de 6 enfants dont l'age varie entre 6 et 28 ans, 4 de ses enfants vont encore à l'école. Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place où elle commercialise les vivres frais (maïs, piment, plantains) depuis 20 ans déjà. c'est grâce à cette activité qu'elle subvient aux besoins de sa famille. Actuellement elle aimerait augmenter la quantité des plantains en achetant en gros ce qui limitera ses déplacement et réduira le coût du transport de ses marchandise. L'achat des platains en gros lui permettra d'augmenter son bénéfice, d'étendre son activité avec le temps et surtout d'économiser  pour les rentrées scolaires prochaine de ses enfants
texts.en: Eteme is a 40-year old woman, a widow, and the mother of six children ranging from six to 28 years of age. Four of her children are still in school. She  has been working as a vendor at the local market selling staple foods (corn, pimentos, plantains) for 20 years already. It is thanks to this work that she is able to provide for her family. At present, she would like to expand  her supply of plantains by buying wholesale, which will minimize her need to travel and decrease the transportation costs for her merchandise. Purchasing plantains wholesale will allow her to improve her income, keep developing her business and, first of all, save some money for the next school year for her children.

loans.use: to buy bunches of plantains wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, leader du groupe d’affaire «Upendo-Kahembe », est jeune entrepreneur, mère de 2 jeunes enfants. Elle est vendeuse de poissons et des boissons.  Son mari est chômeur. Elle installe ses marchandises au marché communal. Il y a 4 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser 7 cycles dans le programme de microcrédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  3 paniers de poissons  à marchander et  10 casiers de boissons (Fanta, Primus, Aigle).  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir confortablement  et acheter une  parcelle.  La cliente salut l’initiative de l’IMF Hekima  en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en: The borrower, a client of MFI Hekima and leader of the business group known as «Upendo-Kahembe », is a young entrepreneur, the mother of two young children. She sells fish and drinks. Her husband is jobless. She displays her merchandise at a community market. For four years, she has been busy with these money-earning activities. Meanwhile, she has just completed seven cycles in Hekima's micro-credit program. This latest loan will allow her to buy three baskets of fish to sell and 10 crates of drinks (Fanta, Primus, Aigle). In future, she would like to see her children grow up in comfort and to be able to buy a plot of land. She salutes Hekima's initiative in favor of poor women who are excluded from conventional banking services.

loans.use: to buy three baskets of fish and 10 crates of drinks (Fanta, Primus, Aigle).

loans.name: Rufino

texts.es:
Rufino, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poderlo invertir en su trabajo, pues por la temporada está iniciando su cultivo de la siembra de maíz y frijol, para esto deberá comprarse abono, herbicidas, para aplicarlas a la tierra, para poder prevenir y fortalecer la plantación. 
El manifiesta que con el préstamo anterior logro invertir en los materiales necesarios, por lo que continua en la crianza de ganado y en la producción agrícola. En su familia las condiciones del hogar han mejorado.
texts.en:
Rufino is seeking a new loan to invest in his farming business, since he is starting to plant for the new season.  He grows corn and beans, for which he needs to buy compost and herbicides to prevent weeds and to fortify his crops.

He reports that with his previous loan he was able to invest in the materials he needed, which resulted in an increase in earnings and in his crop yields.  Overall, conditions for his family have improved.

loans.use: to buy compost and herbicides.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es:
José, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para realizar el cultivo de maíz, pues por la temporada el está preparando el terreno comprándose abono, semilla, herbicidas, que son los principales necesarios para poder ejecutar el trabajo.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, pues ha mejorado la producción en sus parcelas, tambien las condiciones familiares han mejorado.
texts.en: José is asking for a new loan in order to carry out the cultivation of corn.  Because of the season, he is preparing the land buying fertilizer, seed, and weed-killer, which are the main necessities in order to be able to execute his work.  The effect he had with the previous loan was positive since he has improved the production of his plots and his family conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed, and weed-killer.

loans.name: Sare Yoba Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois  est créé le 16 Mai 2011 au jour de son inauguration. Composé de  femmes très actives dans les activités génératrices de revenu, elles vivent toutes dans la même localité. Elles pratiquent dans leur majorité le petit commerce et la transformation. 

Madame Ansata (assise à l’extrême droite avec la main droite levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette. Elle est âgée de 56 ans, est mariée et mère de trois garçons et trois filles enfants. Elle est vendeuse de jus naturels à partir des produits locaux : pain de singe, bissap, … qu’elle achète dans le marché hebdomadaire de sa localité. Pour 01 kilogramme de pain de singe à 200 FCFA, 02 kilogrammes de bissap à 300 FCFA, 01 kilogramme de sucre à 550 FCFA et les autres intrants estimés à 350 FCFA. Elle peut engranger  un bénéfice net de 900 FCFA dans la vente de ces produits.

Elle se sert de ses bénéfices pour épargner et appuyer ses enfants dans leurs activités et la scolarité de ces deux derniers enfants
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on May 16, 2011, the day of its inauguration. The group is composed of women who are very active in revenue-generating businesses and who all live in the same town. Most of them have small business, and they process foods. 

Ms. Ansata (seated at the far right in the photo with her right hand raised) is the featured borrower. She is 56 years old, married, and a mother of three boys and three girls. She sells natural beverages starting with local goods: "monkey bread" (the fruit of the baobab tree), hibiscus flowers,… which she purchases at her town's weekly market. 

For 1 kg of monkey bread at 200 francs CFA, 2 kg of hibiscus at 300 francs, 1 kg of sugar at 550 francs, and the other ingredients at about 350 francs, she can bring in a net profit of 900 francs by selling these products.

She uses her profits as savings and for supporting her children's businesses and for the school expenses of her last two children.

loans.use: to buy monkey bread (the fruit of the baobab tree), dried hibiscus flowers, and a bag of sugar for making different drinks for resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La représentante du groupe d’affaire Tuamke, est un entrepreneur, elle lève sa main sur la photo, mère de 4 enfants, tous étudient  tous. Son conjoint  est un  plombier. Elle fait le petit commerce de vivres (haricots et maïs). Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son mari.  Il ya 4 ans révolu, qu’elle est en activité. Plus tard, elle bénéficia de crédit de l’IMF Hekima. Elle installe ses produits au marché sectoriel. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 2 sacs de haricots vers Rutshuru, zone agro rurale du Nord Kivu. En plus, elle ambitionne construire dans ses 2 parcelles acquises déjà. La cliente  salut l’initiative de l’IMF Hekima pour en faveur de pauvres femmes  exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
The representative of the business group "Tuamke" is the entrepreneur who is raising her hand in the photo, the mother of four children, all of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband is a plumber. She sells foodstuffs (beans and maize) on a small scale. She began her business with her own money, received from her husband. She has been working at it for four years. 

Later on, she got a loan from MFI Hekima. She displays her products at the market of the sector. This latest loan will allow her to buy two sacks of dried beans near Rutshuru, a rural agricultural zone in North Kivu. She has managed to acquire two parcels of land and would like in future to build on them.  She salutes the initiative of MFI Hekima in favor of poor women who are excluded from the services of conventional banks.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of dried beans.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is married and has an eight-year-old child. She sells clothes and shoes to earn a living. She has been in the business for three years. She  employs one person in her business. She also does farming to supplement her income. She has grown her business since she joined Faulu Kenya because she has been trained in business management skills.  

She hopes to grow her business and employ people. She has requested 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy clothes and shoes.

loans.use: To buy clothes and shoes

loans.name: Yulisa Del Carmen

texts.es: Yulisa es casada,   con tres hijos menores de edad, esta emprendedora Tiene su negocio que es la venta de leche, hielo, juguetes, la realiza de forma ambulantes y en su casa de habitación desde hace once años en la actualidad tiene  mucha clientela, pues siempre esta ofreciéndoles a sus clientes un buen servicio. Yulisa es una mujer muy trabajadora con ganas de salir adelante para ella la disciplina es el mejor secreto en el trabajo, porque le permite realizar tus metas en el futuro, se ha decidido a solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar leche, juguetes . ella tiene fe que con su esfuerzo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yulisa is married, with three children living at home.  She has her own business in which she sells milk, ice, and toys.  She does this work door-to-door and out of her home.  She has been in this business for the past eleven years.

Currently she has many customers, since she always provides them with good service.  Yulisa is a very hardworking and ambitious woman.  For her, discipline is the secret to success in her work, because it allows her to reach her goals.  She decided to seek a loan in order to buy milk and toys.  She has faith that through her efforts she will manage to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk, ice and toys for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp and oysters.

loans.name: Good Foundation Group

texts.en: Isaac is a 30-year-old single man. He lives at Kwesimintsim a suburb of Takoradi. He trades in mobile phones and their accessories. He buys his supplies from importers at wholesale prices and gives to his customers at retail prices. He requests the loan to enable him to procure an increased stock of phones and phone accessories. He hopes to increase savings to expand his shop to enable him to support his brothers in school and also be able to travel outside the country to buy his goods. He belongs to the community group called Good Foundation Trust Group. In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral and assist one another to repay the loan.

loans.use: to procure an increased stock of phones and phone accessories

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is married and has a 2 1/2-year-old child.  He sells cosmetics to earn a living.  He has been in this business since 2008.  He has employed one person in his business.  He has grown his business since he joined Faulu Kenya, because he has been trained in business management skills.  

He hopes to grow his business and employ more people.  He has requested a loan for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy perfumes and lotion.

loans.use: To buy perfumes and lotion

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is 32. She has four children aged between five and nine. She has been selling tomatoes and cassava for three years. With this loan, she plans to buy more cassava and tomatoes to sell. The profits from this loan will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more tomatoes and cassava to sell

loans.name: Carla Areli

texts.es: Carla Areli casada con un hijo menor tiene por negocio la venta de pan, y repostería de forma ambulante esta emprendedora tiene tres años de  realizar dicha actividad la cual le ha servido de herramienta de trabajo para poder sufragar gastos familiares y de dicha  forma ser independiente económicamente, Carla esta ubicada en su casa y de forma ambulante, en la actualidad tiene mucha clientela gracias a su esfuerzo empeño y dedicación ha demostrado su responsabilidad , el financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en la compra de productos para su negocio tales como:  pan dulce, pan, simple, picos, tortas, rin, pan cortados, maletas, donas, entre otros.
texts.en: Carla Areli is married with one young son.  She works as a traveling vendor selling bread and pastries.  This job, which she has had for three years, has helped her to defray household expenses and to become financially independent to a degree.  Carla is always at home or on sales rounds.  She now has many customers thanks to her effort, commitment and dedication.  She has proven to be responsible.  She is seeking financing to invest in buying products for her business, including pastries, bread, bread sticks, sandwiches, crusts, and donuts, among others.

loans.use: to buy quantities of pastries, loaves, bread sticks, rolls, sandwiches, crusts, sliced bread, and donuts, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables, beans, oil, and detergents.

loans.name: Parletuan

texts.en:
Parletuan is married and has a five-year-old child. He has a motorbike transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business since 2009. Besides, he operates a retail shop to earn extra income. He has grown his business since he joined Faulu Kenya because he has been trained in business management skills.  

He hopes to grow his business and employ people.  He has requested 20,000 Kenya shillings to repair his motorbike.

loans.use: To repair his motorbike

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana es socia del Bancomunal Los Sauces de Compañía, tiene 22 años de edad y es madre un hijo. Ella es socia de FINCA Perú hace un año y medio, y se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos. Durante todo este tiempo ella ha aprendido sobre las funciones y responsabilidades dentro de su Bancomunal y le gusta participar mucho. Su meta ahora es comprar un terreno donde pueda vivir junto a su familia y poco a poco ya se va acercando a realizarla. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la fabricación de ladrillos.
texts.en: Diana is a member of Communal Bank, The Company Willows, 22 years old, and has one son. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for a year and a half. She makes bricks for a living. She has learned her responsibilities and how the communal bank works. She enjoys participating in the group. She plans on buying land to live on with her family and is reaching her goal little by little. She will use the loan to buy materials to make bricks.

loans.use: buy materials to make bricks

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 39 años y es un muy hombre laborioso. Vive con su esposa y sus cinco hijos en la casa que compraron hace 15 años, desde que se casaron.
Desde ese tiempo, él se dedica a cultivar plantas de café. Esta labor la realiza con el apoyo de sus hijos y su esposa, quienes se esmeran por tener una buena producción, porque gracias a sus cosechas pueden solventar los gastos de su familia. Las asociaciones acopiadoras, quienes compran sus granos, les remuneran a buenos precios por cada kilo, ya que son de muy buena calidad. De este modo, llegan a invertir sembrando más plantas de café y otra parte para los gastos de la educación de sus hijos.

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP y se siente agradecido con este apoyo para seguir con sus planes de trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio alegre y partícipe de las reuniones y actividades.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles de este préstamo comprará abono, fertilizantes y plaguicidas para realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas de café.
texts.en: Alejandro is 39 years old and is a very hardworking man. He lives with his wife and five children in the house that they bought 15 years ago when they got married. Since that time, he has been cultivating coffee plants. He does this work with the help of his wife and children, who endeavor to obtain a good harvest. Thanks to these harvests, they are able to meet all of their family expenses. His wholesale customers pay good prices for every kilogram of his coffee, since it is of very good quality. Thus he has been able to invest in more coffee plants and also has been able to invest in the education of his children. This is his third loan with MFP, and he is grateful for this support that allows him to continue with his plans for his work. He is glad to be a member of his communal bank and participates in the meetings and activities. With the 1,000 nuevos soles from this loan, he will buy compost, fertilizer and fungicide for the maintenance of his coffee plants.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer and fungicide.

loans.name: Ricardo Jose

texts.es: Ricardo José está casado , tiene por actividad económica la compra y venta de ganado , negocio al que se dedica desde hace cuatro años, el lo adquirió por experiencia de su padre y un poco de dinero propio El lo que pretende con el préstamo es comprar una buena parte de ganado, ya que actualmente tiene una buena oferta. El cuenta con la experiencia en la compra y venta de ganado pues este es su negocio que le brinda el alimento diariamente. El quiere generar ganancias para su bienestar y la de su familia y así poderles dar una mejor calidad de vida a futuro. En el futuro tiene sueños y metas como es mejorar su casa
texts.en: Ricardo José is married and works by buying and selling livestock, a job he has performed for four years. He acquired the business through his father's experience and also a bit of his own money. With this loan, he hopes to buy a large quantity of livestock because he currently has a good offer. He depends on experience in buying and selling livestock since this business is what provides for him daily. He wants to generate income for his wellbeing and that of his family so that he can then give them a better quality of life. In the future, he has dreams and goals of improving his home.

loans.use: to buy livestock because he currently has a good offer

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en: Jacqueline is 29 years old. She sells beans, maize, and sorghum. She plans to use the loan to expand her business by buying more beans and maize to sell. With the profits from the business, she will put money into savings and buy a milling machine.

loans.use: To buy more beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Darwin Alexis

texts.es: Darwin Alexis  tiene  por negocio una pulpería Tiene más de 15 años en su negocio, sus 3 hijos están bajo su cargo siempre busca la forma de sacarlos adelante y proporcionarles lo necesario. La mayoría de sus clientes saben los buenos productos que el ofrece. El crédito es para la compra de consumo diario como : arroz, azúcar, frijoles, pan, leche, huevos, verduras, tiste, crema, entre otros
texts.en: Darwin Alexis owns a general store and has been in this business for more than fifteen years.  He has three children in his care and is always looking for ways to get them ahead and provide for their needs.  Most of his customers are familiar with the good products he offers.  He will use the loan for the purchase of everyday consumer products such as rice, sugar, beans, bread, milk, eggs, vegetables, tiste [traditional beverages made from cornmeal and cacao],cream, and other items.

loans.use: to purchase everyday consumer products such as rice, sugar, beans, bread, milk, eggs, vegetables, tiste, cream, and other items.

loans.name: Ascension

texts.es:
Ascensión, Esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder iniciar su trabajo en la agricultura, con la siembra de maíz,  comprará con los fondos prestados abono, herbicidas, para aplicarlos al terreno y poder mejorar la producción.
 
El  efecto que tuvo el préstamo anterior fue positivo, mejorando la producción de maíz y frijoles, le ayudo a realizar ventas y a la alimentación de la familia, sus circunstancias familiares, desde la última vez que sacó un préstamo a través de Kiva han mejorado.
texts.en:
Ascensión is asking for a new loan to begin his work in agriculture with planting corn.  With the requested funds, he will buy fertilizer and weed-killer in order to apply them to the land and improve his production.

The effect of the previous loan was positive; by improving the production of corn and beans it helped him to make sales and feed his family.  His family circumstances have improved since the last time that he got a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and weed-killer.

loans.name: Peruth

texts.en: Peruth is 42 years old. She is married to a farmer. They have seven children and all of them attend school. She has been selling sorghum and beans to sell. With the loan, she wants to buy more beans and sorghum to sell. The profits will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To  buy more sorghum and beans to sell.

loans.name: Celso

texts.es:
Celso tiene 36 años, está casado con Herlinda, de 33 años, y fruto de ese amor tienen tres hijos. Juntos viven en la casa (a base de madera) que compraron hace 8 años, cuando se casaron.
Como todo campesino de su comunidad, se dedica en el cultivo de plantas de café. Sus padres le enseñaron esta labor desde muy pequeño y sabe muy bien en qué fechas producirá en mayor cantidad, y en las que es baja la producción. Generalmente realiza esta actividad solo, pero para la cosecha contrata jornaleros. Posteriormente, lleva a vender sus granos a las sociedades acopiadoras, quienes le dan muy buen pago por cada saco de kilo. Con el tiempo, desea comprar otro terreno para seguir plantando más café y de esa manera aumentar su producción.

Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP y se siente muy agradecido por la oportunidad y confianza que le dan nuevamente, ya que está dispuesto y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Asimismo, se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago como en anteriores créditos. 
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles solicitados comprará sacos de abono para esparcir en sus cultivos de café, los que muy pronto estará cosechando.
texts.en: Celso is 36 years sold and is married to Herlinda, who is 33. They have three children. They live together in their wooden house that they bought 8 years ago when they were married. Like all of the farmers in their community, he grows coffee plants. His parents taught him this work from the time he was very small. He knows very well which times of year will bring large harvests, and which times will provide smaller yields. He generally works on his own, but for the harvest he hires laborers. Following the harvests, he brings his coffee beans to the wholesalers, who pay him very well for every kilogram. Eventually he wants to buy another plot of land so he can continue to plant more coffee and increase his production. This is his fourth loan with MFP, and he is very grateful for the opportunity and the trust that they are again showing. He is ready to work hard and is very motivated. At the same time, he promises to be punctual with his loan repayments, as he has been with his previous loans. With the 2,000 nuevos soles he is seeking, he will purchase bags of compost to spread out over his coffee crops, which will be harvested very soon.

loans.use: to buy bags of compost for his coffee plants.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María forma parte del Banco Comunal “Mis Sueños” perteneciente a la ciudad de Talca.
Ella se dedica al rubro de la confección haciendo buzos, cortinas y ropa en general, además se dedica a otros oficios como la venta de carbón, realiza tejidos, borda y hace cojines artesanales, desde hace 15 años. Comenta que trabaja sola y atiende de lunes a viernes y su horario de trabajo lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
Su mercadería la compra en la ciudad de Santiago en diferentes distribuidoras a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crecidito comprará carbón, además telas, hilo, cierres, botones para la confección de ropa.
Una de las metas de Maria es instalar un taller en su casa, y darles la oportunidad de trabajo a otras personas y así optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Maria vive junto a su madre y padre, esta al cuidado de ellos y uno de sus sueños es instalar un taller en su casa para cuidar a sus padres y poder atender a su clientela en forma más tranquila. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio.
Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades, intereses, lo cual también le ha servido como un momento de distracción.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
María belongs to the “Mis Sueños” communal bank, whose members live in the city of Talca.

She works as a seamstress, and makes sportswear, curtains and clothing in general. In addition, over the last 15 years, she has had other occupations such as selling charcoal, weaving, embroidering, and making hand-crafted cushions. She says that she works alone, opens from Monday to Friday, and manages her hours of work according to her availabilty.

She buys her merchandise in the city of Santiago at various distributors that are low cost, and therefore advantageous from a financial standpoint. 

With the loan she will buy charcoal, and also fabric, thread, zippers and buttons for making clothing.

One of María's goals is to set up a workshop in her home, and to give other people the opportunity to work, and this way the chance for a better quality of life.

Maria lives with her mother and father and looks after them, One of her dreams is to set up a workshop in her home so that she can look after her parents and serve her customers more easily.

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza has offered her, as it has allowed her to invest in her business.

As well, she feels very much at ease in the company of the other entrepreneurs in the communal bank group. They share various activities and  interests, which has also served as an enjoyable distraction for her. 

Talca is part of the Maule region, located in the central area of the country. It constitutes the administrative, economic and cultural center of the region, being the most important city in the Chilean central valley.

Talca is the subject of a curious phrase in Chile: "Talca, París y Londres" ("Talca, Paris, and London"). Among the possible explanations for this are some that say it derives from a comment made by an Englishman: "Talca parece Londres" (which, in Spanish, sounds like "Talca, París y Londres", meaning "Talca resembles London"). Indeed, in the winter, an abundant fog often blankets the city, as happens in the capital of the United Kingdom.

loans.use: To buy charcoal, and also fabric, thread, zippers and buttons for making clothing.

loans.name: Walter Milton

texts.es:
Walter Esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo porque quiere continuar trabajando en la agricultura, comprará con los fondos prestados abono, 2000 plantas de chile, para mejorar su capacidad, incrementando la producción de este vegetal. 
El efecto tuvo el préstamo anterior fue positivo, esto le motivo a seguir trabajando con la institución, mejoro las ganancias por las ventas ocasionadas de la producción,   las circunstancias familiares, desde la última vez que sacó un préstamo a través de Kiva han mejorado.
texts.en:
Walter is asking for a new loan because he wants to continue working in agriculture.  He will buy fertilizer and 2000 chilli plants to improve and increase his production capacity.

His previous loan had a positive effect, which encouraged him to continue working with the institution.  He improved his earnings from the sales of his chilli, and his family's circumstances have improved since the last time he took a loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and 2000 chilli plants

loans.name: Francine

texts.en: Francine is 34 years old. She is a mother of three children aged between one and seven. Only one child goes to school. She has been in the shoe-selling business for four years. She has requested a loan to buy more shoes to sell. With the profits, she will have more savings.

loans.use: To buy more shoes to sell

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
Ernestina tiene 25 años, ella es padre y madre para su pequeño hijo Efraín, de 8 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia, la cual llegó a comprar con mucho esfuerzo durante 5 años de arduo trabajo. 
Ella es agricultora, produce café, actividad de la que se siente muy orgullosa y la realiza desde hace 11 años, fue enseñada por sus padres. También, en ocasiones, trabaja como jornalera en otras parcelas para obtener un dinero extra y que no le falte nada a su pequeño hijo.  Cuando llega la temporada de cosecha contrata peones, ya que de esa manera puede terminar de extraer rápido los granos de café. Sin embargo, le cuesta mucho dejar a su hijo para seguir con su labor, pero gracias a su esfuerzo puede obtener una mejor calidad de vida. 

Este es su segundo crédito con MFP y se siente muy agradecida con el apoyo brindado, por lo que se compromete a ser responsable con sus cuotas de pago. Así también, en su banco comunal es una socia puntual en las reuniones y sobre todo solidaria. 
Con el préstamo de 2,000 nuevos soles comprará injertos de café para cultivar en su terreno.
texts.en: Ernestina is 25 years old. She is both the mother and the father for her little boy Efraín, who is 8 years old. They live together in their own house, which she was able to buy with a great deal of effort during 5 years of hard work. She is a farmer and grows coffee. She is very proud of her work and has been doing this for the last 11 years. She was taught by her parents. Also, on occasions, she works as a laborer for other farmers in order to obtain extra money so that her young son will not lack anything he needs. When it is time to harvest, she hires workers, since in this way she is able to finish the harvest quickly. Though it pains her to be away from her son in order to do her work, she has been able to obtain a better quality of life for them through her efforts. This is her second loan with MFP, and she is very thankful for the support. She promises to be responsible and make her repayments on time. Likewise, in her communal bank, she is always punctual at the meetings and above all is very loyal. With the 2,000 nuevos soles, she will buy coffee seedlings to grow on her land.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings to grow on her land.

loans.name: Marinely

texts.es: Marinely clienta Kiva de oficio comerciante se dedica al negocio de pulpería desde hace 2 años, soltera, de 44 años de edad, originaria de Granada. Su primer crédito lo utilizo para compra de granos básicos azúcar, arroz, jabón, frijoles, pan, todo lo necesario para surtir el negocio, este crédito fue una gran oportunidad porque le permitió invertir en productos que son de alto consumo para sus clientes. En su negocio recibe el apoyo de su hermana y una sobrina quienes la acompañan a hacer las compras diarias. Ahora requiere de su segundo crédito para compra de cosméticos y artículos de la temporada, este nuevo crédito será de ayuda porque podrá diversificarse en productos para su negocio también  incrementaran sus ventas generándole a la vez mas ganancias, sus planes futuros es seguir trabajando con el apoyo de créditos para mantener su negocio, tener mejores condiciones económicas y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Kiva client Marinely, a merchant, earns a living in the general store business which she has been in for two years. She is single, 44 years of age, and comes from Granada. Her first loan was used to purchase basic staples: sugar, rice, soap, beans, bread, everything needed to stock the business. This loan was a big opportunity because it allowed her to invest in high-consumption products for her customers. In her business she receives support from her sister and a niece who accompany her while she makes the daily purchases. 

Now she needs her second loan in order to purchase cosmetics and seasonal items. This new loan will be a help because she will be able to diversify her product line and also increase her sales, making more of a profit at the same time. Her plans for the future are to continue working with the help of the loans in order to keep her business running, to have better financial conditions and to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and seasonal items.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos, el trabaja en la siembra de pipián y maíz, este oficio lo aprendió muy joven con su padre, tiene 10 realizando su propio cultivo junto a su esposa.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de 7 sacos de abono y herbicidas, estos le sirven para aplicarlos al cultivo y poder prevenirlo de plagas, este préstamo le ayudara a tener una mejor productividad con los materiales que aplicara.
L a aspiración de José es que sus cultivos sean cada vez más provechosos, manteniendo  a su familia con todo lo necesario para sobrevivir.
texts.en:
José is a farmer who lives with his wife and four children.  He plants "pipián" and corn, a skill he learnt very young with his father.  He has spent 10 years running his own farm, together with his wife.

He is asking for a loan to buy 7 sacks of fertilizer and weed killer, which he can use on his crops to prevent pests.  The loan will help him to increase productivity as a result of the products he'll use on his crops. 

His hope is for his crops to become more and more profitable, thus maintaining and providing his family with everything necessary to get by.

loans.use: to buy 7 sacks of fertilizer and weed killer

loans.name: Ingrid Yamileth

texts.es:
Ingrid, tiene 19 años de edad, tiene una hija de un año, vive con su esposo y la suegra, juntos cultivan la tierra para producir  maíz y frijol,  con este oficio ellos han logrado salir adelante pues lo realizan desde hace dos años.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, para beneficiar el cultivo, pues esto le dará la oportunidad de mejorar la producción de granos básicos.
El objetivo de Ingrid, es mejorar su trabajo, para que sus ingresos aumenten, que su hija crezca en buen ambiente.
texts.en:
Ingrid is 19 years old. She has a one year old daughter and she lives with her husband and mother-in-law. Together, they cultivate the land to produce corn and beans, and with this work they have managed to improve their situation, as they have now been doing it for two years. 
She is requesting a loan to buy compost and herbicides to improve the crop, as this will give her the opportunity to improve her production of basic grains. Ingrid's objective is to improve her work so that her income rises and her daughter can grow up in a good environment.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicides.

loans.name: Pedro Humberto

texts.es:
Pedro, es comerciante de ropa, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, todos trabajan unidos, el por su parte sale a vender ropa, es negocio surgió por iniciativa propia, no tiene un horario fijo para realizar su venta.
El solicita un préstamo para comprarse un surtido de prendas de vestir blusas, faldas, vestidos, ropa interior y otros productos que son de mayor demanda con los clientes, esta compra le permitirá crecer y poder mejorar la atención a los clientes.
La aspiración de Pedro es tener éxito en el negocio, incrementar las ventas para generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Pedro is a clothing merchant. He lives with his wife and children. They all work to support each other. For his part he goes out to sell clothing, a business he began by his own initiative. He does not have a fixed schedule for making his sales. 

He is seeking a loan in order to buy a selection of dressy articles of clothing: blouses, skirts, dresses, underwear and other products which are in higher demand by his customers. This purchase will allow him to grow and improve his customer service. 

Pedro's dream is to be successful in the business and increase sales to generate better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as blouses, skirts, dresses and underwear.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: Alejandra es socia del Bancomunal Los Sauces de Compañía y tiene 35 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos, se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de vegetales como espinaca, lechuga y poro que luego vende en el mercado local. Gracias a los préstamos que le ha facilitado FINCA Perú ella tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar e invertir en su negocio y ha logrado mucho gracias a ello como brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos, su motivación es cumplir su gran meta de progresar al lado de sus hijos. El préstamo que solicita los invertirá en la compra de abonos y semillas para la siembra de vegetales.
texts.en: Alejandra is a member of communal bank, The Company Willows, is 35 years old, and has 3 children. She grows vegetable such as spinach, lettuce, and leeks then sells them at local markets. Thanks to the loans she was offered through FINCA Perú she was able to work and invest in her business. She has accomplished things such as offer her children a good education. Her goal is to improve her business while maintaining her children.  The loan will be used to buy fertilizer and seeds to grow more vegetables.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and seeds to grow more vegetables

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo tiene 37 años de edad, vive en la linda ciudad de Pucallpa, ubicada en la selva peruana, la cual alberga, mucha flora y fauna maravillosa, se desarrolla la agricultura, la ganadería y la textileria, es un lugar muy bonito en el cual podemos desconectarnos de lo habitual de la vida cotidiana y disfrutar de sus paisajes y de lo maravilloso de la naturaleza. Leonardo vive al lado de su esposa con la cual tiene 4 hijos cuyas edades comprende 7, 11, 13,15, a quienes quiere y ama muchísimo y se esfuerza cada día por sacarlos adelante y que sean personas de bien, cuando dispone de un tiempo libre Leonardo sale a pasear con su familia sobre todo para compartir, también en ocasiones le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo pescado frito. Con mucho entusiasmo Leonardo logro terminar su carrera como profesor de primaria y esta carrera le gusta mucho porque tiene mucha paciencia para enseñar.

Día a Día Leonardo trabaja en su negocio de elaboración de y venta de cuadros artísticos, así como también brinda su servicio de alojamiento a los turistas que llegan a su ciudad, también tiene una pequeña orquesta de música típica, Leonardo es como llamamos en nuestro país un mil oficios ya que trabaja en todo con tal que sea de manera honrada, es muy activo y carismático y por ello el cree que le va bien en su negocio por esa amabilidad y por ese carisma que lo caracteriza y por el esfuerzo que le pone para salir adelante ya que si no trabajara en todo lo que el hace no podría darles el sustento necesario para su hogar.

Leonardo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar camas, colchones, sabanas mosquiteros y realizar una reparaciones en las habitaciones que ofrece a los turistas, ya que se acerca la temporada de turismo en su ciudad, así de esta manera el podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio y comodidad a los turistas que se hospedan en su negocio y podrá mejorar sus ingresos y los clientes recomendaran su negocio, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando con ese empeño y fuerza para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” poder darles una buena educación a sus hijos y poder tener un gran hotel”.
texts.en:
Leonardo is 37 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Pucallpa, in the Peruvian jungle.  This city has a lot of stunning flora and fauna.  The people here work in farming, livestock raising and textiles.  It is a very beautiful place where we are able to separate ourselves from everyday life and enjoy the landscape and amazing nature.  Leonardo lives together with his wife.  The couple have four children who are 7, 11, 13 and 15 years old.  Leonardo loves them very much indeed and works hard in order to provide for them and ensure they become upstanding citizens.  Whenever he has any free time, Leonardo goes out for walks with his family.  He also occasionally likes to eat one of his favorite meals: delicious fried fish.  Leonardo managed to complete a degree and become an elementary school teacher.  He really enjoys this career because he has a lot of patience for teaching.  

Leonardo also works every day in his business making and selling paintings.  In addition to this, he provides an accommodation service to tourists who come to his city, and has a small, traditional, music orchestra.  Leonardo is, as we say in our country, a 'mil oficios' (Jack of all trades) because he does all kinds of jobs, as long as they are honest.  He is very active and charming and believes that he is doing well in his business as a result of this kindness and charisma, and because he puts a lot of effort into his work so that he can get ahead in life.  He needs to work in all his different business activities in order to provide for his household.

Leonardo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy beds, mattresses, sheets and mosquito nets.  He will also be able to make repairs to some of the rooms that he provides to tourists.  The tourist season is approaching and he would like to be able to provide a better service and greater comfort to the tourists who stay with him.  This will enable him to improve his income and his customers will recommend his business.  As a result, he will be able to continue working hard so that he can make his biggest dreams come true: to provide his children with a good education and to own a great hotel.

loans.use: to buy beds, sheets, mosquito nets, etc.

loans.name: Kezie

texts.en: Kezie is 30 years old. She is married with four children. She has been a businesswoman for 6 years. She sells sorghum, beans, and cassava. She has requested a loan to buy more sorghum and beans to sell. With the profits, she will pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum, beans, and cassava to sell.

loans.name: Dulce De Jesus

texts.es:
Dulce, se dedica a la venta de verduras y flores, ella tiene dos hijos uno de ellos estudia, están menores de edad, el negocio de Dulce comenzó hace varios años, lo atiende en el mercado, trabaja de lunes a domingo.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de tomates, papas, plátanos, flores, aguacates, entre otros  que sean de preferencia de los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar el negocio, incrementando el inventario.
El objetivo de ella es fortalecer el negocio, ofrecer cada vez mejor calidad de frutas y verduras frescas,
texts.en:
Dulce earns a living selling fruits, vegetables and flowers. She has two minor children one of whom is in school. Dulce's business was started up a number of years ago. She plys her wares in the marketplace and works from Monday to Sunday. 

She is seeking a loan for the purchase of tomatoes, potatoes, bananas, flowers, and avocados among other items favored by her customers. This loan will allow her to improve the business, increasing the inventory. 

Her objective is to strengthen the business, offering an ever higher quality of fresh fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, potatoes, bananas, flowers and avocados.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio, tiene la edad  de 52 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y siete hijos   actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar una vaca para leche.
