El cuenta ya con dos vacas para la leche en su poder y lo que quiere es fortalecer el negocio de venta de leche y de queso y además vende natilla el tiene pensado vender todos estos productos en el mercado local y en lugares aledaños  y así  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Antonio is 52 years old, and lives with his wife and kids. With the support from this loan, he plans to purchase a dairy cow. He has two dairy cows presently, and he wants to strengthen his milk and cheese sales business, and he also wants to start selling custard. He plans to sell all his products in the local market and in surrounding areas to generate more income and hopefully improve his family's financial stability and quality of life.

This is José Antonio's first loan with FUDECOSUR, and he has not had any previous loans with state-run banks. He chose FUDECOSUR for their lower interest rates and better services for borrowers.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Actualmente la Sra. Teresa trabaja en una maquiladora y su esposo trabaja como comisionista y vendedor ambulante de helados y desean poner a funcionar el carrito de perros calientes para iniciar su propio negocio.  Tienen una hija que esta estudiando la preparatoria.  La Sra. Teresa es originaria de la ciudad de Mante Tamaulipas. Y vive en esta ciudad desde hace varios años
Ella quiere arreglar su carrito para perros calientes y ponerlo a funcionar para generar un ingreso extra y bajarle la cargar a su esposo y darle un mayor bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Currently Teresa works in a manufacturing plant and her husband works as a middleman and salesman selling ice cream in the street. They want to get in working order a cart for selling hotdogs so they can start their own business. They have one daughter who is studying. Teresa is originally from the city of Mante Tamaulipas. She has lived in this city for a few years now. 

She wants to fix the cart that she already has so that it is in working order and she can make extra income. Her husband will be in charge of running the hot dog cart. This will give a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to pay for remodeling and ingredients.

loans.name: Nolvia Francisca

texts.es: Nolvia casada, con dos hijos menores de edad, de treinta y nueve años de edad, tiene x actividad económica la venta de pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación financiamiento  lo quiere para la construccion de una parte de su casa de habitacion como son las recamaras, con el financiamiento comprara  material de construccion como: zinc, madera, clavos, cemento, hierro entre otros.
texts.en: Nolvia is 39 years old. She is married with two young children and she works in a small grocery store which she has in her home. She would like a loan to construct a part of her house with bedrooms. She will use the loan to buy construction materials including zinc, wood, nails, cement and iron, amongst others.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as zinc, wood, nails, cement and iron, amongst others.

loans.name: Jose Camilo

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, tiene tres hijos de 16, 12 y7 años de edad, tiene  casa propia, vive con su esposa, el trabaja realizando la siembra de maíz y chile, lo aprendió  con sus padres, tiene como 20 años realizándolo.
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compran de productos el abono, sulfato y herbicidas, tambien 1500 plantas de chile, esto le ayudara a estar preparado para realizar la siembra, con la posibilidad e generar mejores ingresos a su familia.
La aspiración de Jose es mejorar económicamente para salir adelante con su familia, pues quiere apoyarlos en todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
José is a farmer. He has three children of 16, 12 and 7 years of age. He has his own home and lives with his wife. He works growing corn and chile peppers which he learned from his parents, and has been doing it for around 20 years. 

He is seeking a loan to purchase products such as fertilizer, sulfate and herbicides, along with 1,500 chile pepper plants. This will help him to be prepared for planting crops, with the possibility of generating a better income for his family. 

José's aspiration is to improve financially in order to get ahead with his family, since he wants to support them in everything they need.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, sulfate, and herbicide, along with 1,500 chile pepper plants.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred is married and has two children. She sells charcoal to earn a living. She has been in the business since 2011. She has grown her business since she joined Faulu Kenya because she has been trained in business management skills.

She hopes to grow her business and employ people. She has requested 30,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to add stock of charcoal.

loans.use: To add stock of charcoal.

loans.name: Valeria Valentina

texts.es:
La Sra. Valeria comenta que cada vez que va a hacer tamales tiene que estar comprando el material para elaborarlos y con el préstamo quiere surtir una suficiente cantidad de materia prima como la harina, hojas, bolsas, etc. Y no estar comprando cada semana, solo lo necesario.
La Sra. Valeria se dedica a la venta de tamales desde hace aproximadamente un año. Actualmente su esposo trabaja en una empresa de la ciudad, no tienen hijos aun.  Es originaria de esta ciudad, en la casa donde vive la renta desde hace 4 años.
texts.en:
Valeria says that every time she makes tamales she has to buy the products needed to make them, and with the loan she wants to stock up with a sufficient quantity of materials such as flour, leaves, bags, etc. so that she doesn't have to buy them every week, only when necessary. 
Valeria has been selling tamales for around a year. Her husband is currently working in a business in the city, and they do not have any children yet. She is a native of this city and she has been renting the house where she lives for 4 years.

loans.use: to buy material to make tamales.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es: Elías, tiene la edad  de 39 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar la semilla de café para hacer un almacigo y además las bolsas que se necesitan para hacer el almacigo insumos como abonos y fumigaciones. El tiene pensado hacer este almacigal y darle el adecuado mantenimiento con los insumos, para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad y lugares aledaños  y así generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Elías is 39 years old, married, and currently lives with his wife and four children. With the loan he plans to purchase coffee plant seeds in order to make a plant nursery, as well as the bags he needs to make the nursery, supplies such as fertilizers and fumigants. 

He has plans to make this nursery and give it the appropriate maintenance with the supplies, in order to later sell in the local market and neighboring areas. So he hopes to make more earnings and achieve a better quality of life and financial stability. This is the first loan he has received from Fudecosur. He has not taken out any previous loan with state banks, but Fudecosur has provided the loan with greater ease and at much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and supplies.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel  cliente Kiva de 27 años de edad es originario de Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí, soltero, su nivel académico es hasta el bachiller, de oficio agricultor se dedica a la siembra de  café desde hace 2 años. El utilizo su primer préstamo para sembrar  1 manzana de café y cubrir costos de  producción en la compra de  insumos y pago de mano de obra  para darle un mejor mantenimiento a su producto y tener  buenos rendimientos de la cosecha. Ahora el requiere de su segundo préstamo  al igual para invertir en la compra de insumos, abono, semilla de café y pago de mano de obra  para la cosecha de este año ya que su deseo  es ofrecer  un producto de buena calidad que pueda vender a un buen precio para obtener mejores ingresos, el espera contar con el apoyo de otros créditos para seguir trabajando en su negocio ya que sus metas próximas  es ampliar el numero de áreas sembradas de café, comprar equipos y maquinas de trabajo como bomba de riego para preparar las tierras.
texts.en:
Israel is 27 years old and is from Pueblo Nuevo in the municipality of Estelí. He is single and has his bachelor's degree in agriculture, and has made a living as a coffee farmer for the past 2 years. He used the support from his first loan, to plant nearly two acres of coffee plants, cover input costs, and pay hired help during the harvest season. 

For this, his second loan, he plans to use the loan support to purchase input items, such as manure and coffee seeds, and to pay hired help for the harvest season. He wants to offer high quality products that he can sell at good prices and use to generate profits. He hopes to apply for other loans in the future, since his future goals are to acquire more land, plant more coffee plants, and purchase machinery such as an irrigation pump for preparing his lands.

loans.use: to purchase manure, coffee seeds, and pay hired help for this year's coffee harvest.

loans.name: Carla Vanessa

texts.es: Carla Vanessa  soltera con dos hijos menores, tiene por actividad económica un comedor en su casa de habitación desde hace trece años  sus propósitos son superarse en la vida para salir adelante con su negocio ya que es lo que mas importante para seguir generando a su familia el sustento diario. El financiamiento es para granos básicos, frutas, verduras, platos desechables y cubiertos, su sueños  en un futuro es hacer una nueva cocina con mejores condiciones para el negocio.
texts.en: Carla Vanessa is single with two young children. She has been running a canteen in her home for the last thirteen years. Her objective is to better herself in life by keeping her business going as this is the most important thing so that she can continue to support her family. The loan is for basic grains, fruit, vegetables and disposable plates and cutlery. Her dream for the future is to make a new kitchen with better conditions for the business.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, fruit, vegetables and disposable plates and cutlery.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, tiene la edad  de 53 años, está soltero,  vive con su madre  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar insumos como abonos y fumigaciones  y ayudarse con la mano de obra. El tiene pensado comprar todos estos insumos y además una máquina para limpiar el monte del café y unos cuchillos y palas para que se mantenga en excelentes condiciones y hacerlo de una forma más ágil y rápida  y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jesús is 53 years old.  He is single and currently lives with his mother.  Jesús plans to use his loan to buy supplies such as fertilizers and sprays.  He will also pay laborers.  He plans to buy the aforementioned supplies, a machine for weeding among his coffee crops, and also some knives and spades, so that he can keep his crops in excellent conditions and do his work more nimbly and quickly.  This will make him more profits and he will be able to attain a better quality of life and financial stability.

This is the first loan that Jesús has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies and work tools

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto, tiene la edad  de 38 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y una hija   actualmente. El con el crédito pretende invertir en mano de obra para la asistencia de la finca la cual cuenta con pasto para ganado y una parte de la propiedad esta con café. El tiene pensado mantener la finca en mejores condiciones  y hacerlo de una forma más ágil   y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Ernesto, 38, and his wife have one daughter.  He is applying for a loan to hire a farm laborer for his farm.  He has pasture land for cattle and a small coffee plantation.  He wants to make sure that his farm is well maintained so that he can increase his earnings and, in turn, his family's quality of life.  This is his first FUDECOSUR loan.  He likes FUDECOSUR because its terms are reasonable and its interest rates low.

loans.use: to hire a farm laborer for his farm.

loans.name: Landi

texts.en:
Landi is a 33-year-old Romani man from the Roma ethnic community of Albania. He has no children and is not married. This is his first time applying for a loan through VisionFund Albania. The business that Landi has been involved in for the past five years has been selling used clothes and accessories, and this business has proved to be successful. In the city where he lives, many people who happen to be poor still consider buying used clothes versus new ones because the city's economy is not that strong there. The city is located in the center of Albania. 

The loan he is applying for is to build a little place, sort of a store, so that he does not sell in the streets anymore. Landi is an energetic young man who has lots of plans for the future; he wants to get married and have children, build a house, and expand his business.  He said, "I believe that I will fulfill my plans with time, with the drive and desire I have. And for this I need lenders' appreciation and help."

Landi thanks in advance all potential Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To build a little store

loans.name: Denise

texts.en: Denise is 32 years old. She is married with six children, four of whom are enrolled in schools. She sells sugar and cooking oil and has been in this business for the past 5 years. With the loan requested, she will add more sugar and cooking oil to sell. With the profits, she will pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Pedro Clemente

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro es padre de 4 hijos, todos en edad escolar. Es viudo desde hace varios años.  Trabaja como administrador de una empresa transportista desde hace 4 años. Es originario de esta ciudad.
El Sr. Pedro constantemente esta realizando mejoras a su vivienda, ahora necesita el enjarre del techo de la galería, además de que logra una mejor apariencia del frente de su casa, también la protege. Les quiere dar lo mejor a sus hijos ya que la falta de una madre es muy dura y el tiene que ser padre y madre a la vez.
texts.en:
Pedro is the father of four school-age children.  He has been a widow for several years.  He has been working as an administrator for a transport company for four years.  He is originally from this city.

Pedro is constantly making improvements to his home.  Right now he needs to plaster his porch roof so that he can give the front of his home a better appearance and also protect it.  He would like to provide his children with the best in life because they have it very tough living without their mother and he has to be both father and mother to them.

loans.use: to plaster his porch roof

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
Actualmente el Sr. José trabaja como panadero en una cadena de tiendas de auto servicio desde hace 2 años pero desea el ser su propio jefe y más adelante instalar su propio negocio de elaboración de pasteles. Tanta es su pasión por la panadería que actualmente hace pasteles por pedidos y le va muy bien, pero siendo su ingreso principal el de su trabajo.  Esta casado y tiene un hijo y el afortunado padre esta en espera de otro que ya viene en camino.
El quiere empezar su negocio y quiere comprar materia prima para la elaboración y decoración del mismo. También sueña con tener un medio de transporte donde pueda llevar sus pedidos a domicilio.
texts.en:
At the moment, Mr. José is a baker in a chain of self-service stores for 2 years now but would like to be his own boss and have his own bakery in the future. He is so passionate about his work that he takes orders and business is going very well. This is his main source of income. He is married, has a son, and this fortunate father has another child on the way.
He wants to start his business and buy materials to make and decorate cakes. He also dreams of having a means of transport to deliver cakes to clients.

loans.use: buy materials to make and decorate cakes

loans.name: Good Mother Group

texts.en: Cecilia is 48 years old. She is married with two children. Currently, all her children are in school. She sells coconut oil, the business which is her source of livelihood. She has been selling coconut oil for 13 years to support her family. Due to lack of adequate funds she is unable to buy more coconut to process and extract the oil. With this loan, she wants to buy more bags of coconut. She hopes to use part of her profit to support her kids in school and also build her house. Cecilia is a member of a community group called Good Mothers Group. In this group, members guarantee and support one another to repay their loans.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of coconut to process and extract the oil.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea, tiene la edad  de 31años, está casada,  vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos   actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar almacigo de café e insumos como abonos y herbecidas  y ayudarse con la mano de obra. Ella tiene pensado comprar este almacigo para su posterior siembra en una propiedad de la familia y con los insumos mantenerlo en excelentes condiciones y poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Andrea, 31, and her husband have three children.  She is applying for a loan, part of which she will use to buy coffee plants and supplies for her next coffee planting and part to pay a farm laborer.  She will plant coffee on land that belongs to her family and use the supplies she buys--fertilizers, etc.--to get the best yield possible.  She wants to increase her income and, in turn, her family's quality of life.  This is her first FUDECOSUR loan.  She's never approached a bank before, not even from a state-owned bank, but she likes FUDECOSUR because it offers the easiest terms and lowest interest rates.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants for her farming business.

loans.name: Adrian De Jesus

texts.es:
Adrián, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, ya que considera que el anterior hizo un gran aporte para realizar su trabajo en la agricultura, el está preparando nuevamente sus tierras para iniciar la siembra de maíz, para esto se comprará abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, que son los materiales necesarios para aplicarlos al cultivo.

El considera que el préstamo anterior y ayudó para realizar la siembra, ya que pudo aplicar todo lo necesario para obtener una buena producción de maíz, en su familia considera que las condiciones han cambiado y durante este período han tenido lo necesario para sobrevivir.
texts.en:
Adrián is seeking a new loan, since he believes that the previous loan played a key part in the success of his farming work.  He is preparing his land again to start planting corn.  For this he will buy compost, insecticides, and pesticides, as they are the materials he needs for his crops.

His prior loan helped him to plant his crops successfully, since he was able to do everything necessary to obtain a good harvest of corn.  He feels that conditions in his family have changed for the better, and during this period they have had everything that is necessary to survive.

loans.use: to buy compost, insecticides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Azucena Marisol

texts.es:
Azucena, está interesada en un nuevo préstamo ya que su intención es mantenerse en el negocio de las pupusas para esto solicita el préstamo y comprarse aceite, maíz, chicharrón, quesillo y materiales para empacar, esto le ayudará a tener un negocio más competente y aumentar la producción de las pupusas.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, esto la motivó a seguir trabajando y poder darle al negocio el fortalecimiento necesario ya que la demanda de los clientes sigue igual por lo mismo debe estar preparada para atenderlos, y en su familia las condiciones se mantiene.
texts.en:
Azucena is interested in a new loan since she wants to continue her pupusa making business. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase oil, corn, sausage, cheese, and packing materials. All of these items will help her strengthen her business and increase her production levels.

Her previous loan was very helpful and motivated her to continue working and improving her business to keep up with customer demands. Her family is in stable condition.

loans.use: to purchase oil, corn and sausage.

loans.name: Joel Antonio

texts.es: Joel de 33 años de edad habitante de Palacaguina, Estelí, es de oficio comerciante se dedica al negocio de pulpería desde hace 6 años, padre de un hijo el cual esta a su cargo. Joel es cliente Kiva, su primer préstamo lo invirtió en la compra de granos básicos para el negocio tales como enlatados, pan, leche, aceite, productos de limpieza, galletas, etc. Este primer  crédito le ayudo ya que pudo surtir  su pulpería con productos muy solicitados por sus clientes, en el negocio recibe el apoyo de su esposa  que le ayuda con la administración del negocio. El ahora requiere de su segundo crédito al igual para invertir en su pulpería con mercadería tales como azúcar, jabón, café, galletas, enlatados, huevo, pan, etc. Todos los productos necesarios para surtir aun más el inventario de su negocio. El estima que este préstamo le será de gran ayuda ya que aumentaran sus ventas generándole más ganancias que luego invertirá en su negocio y en la mejora de su vivienda. Sus planes futuros es ampliar más su negocio hasta convertirlo en una miscelánea para tener un negocio estable que le genere  mejores ingresos y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en: Joel, 33, lives in Palacaguina, Esteli.  He has operated a corner grocery for 6 years.  He is married and has one son.  His wife helps him with the business.  Joel used his first Kiva loan to stock his store with canned goods, bread, milk, cooking oil, cleaning products, snacks, etc.  The loan helped him to provide the products that his customers most want.  He's now applying for a second loan that he will use to buy merchandise--sugar, soap, coffee, snacks, canned goods, eggs, bread, etc.--for the business.  All are products he has to stock to be successful.  He believes that the loan will help him to increase his sales so that he can use the extra income to, one, invest in the business and, two, improve his quality of life.  For the future, he wants to expand his business and add more inventory because growing the business will increase his income and boost his family's living standards.

loans.use: to stock his grocery.

loans.name: Fabián

texts.es:
Fabián tiene 58 años. Se separó de su esposa hace tres años y actualmente vive solo en la casa que compró gracias a su trabajo como agricultor.  
Se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 35 años, tiene su propia parcela ubicada a media hora desde su comunidad. Normalmente trabaja solo, pero en los tiempos de cosecha contrata el apoyo de sus vecinos, quienes son jornaleros y expertos en la extracción de los frutos de café y cacao. Sin embargo, aun le resulta difícil tener que transportar su cosecha hasta los centros de acopio que están a una hora de su pueblo.
Para el futuro desea comprar un vehículo que le facilite transportar fácilmente sus sacos de café y cacao; pero su prioridad ahora es fertilizar sus plantas para que obtenga una buena cosecha durante la temporada de junio y julio, ya que son los mejores meses para sus productos.

Este es su crédito número 7 con MFP, por ello se siente agradecido, nuevamente, con las personas que confían en su trabajo y apoyan su labor. Asimismo, le gusta ser parte de su banco comunal, se siente a gusto con sus compañeros.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles de este préstamo comprará sacos de abono para esparcir en sus plantas de café y cacao.
texts.en: Fabián is 58 years old. He separated from his wife three years ago and currently lives on his own in the house that he bought from his earnings as a farmer. He has been farming for 35 years. He has his own parcel of land that is located a half-hour away from his home. Usually he works alone, but during the harvest he hires his neighbors to support his work. His neighbors are laborers and are experts in harvesting coffee and cacao. However, it is still difficult to have to transport his crops to the wholesale centers that are an hour away from his village. In the future he wants to buy a vehicle that will make it easy for him to transport his bags of coffee and cocoa, but at the moment his priority is to fertilize his plants in order to obtain a good harvest during June and July, since these are the most productive months. This is his 7th loan with MFP, for which he is grateful, again, for the people who trust in his work and support his labor. Likewise, he his happy to be part of his communal bank, and enjoys working with his fellow members. With the 2,000 nuevos soles from this loan, he will buy bags of fertilizer to spread over his coffee and cocoa plants.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his coffee and cocoa plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm supplies

loans.name: Santos Antonio

texts.es: Santos Antonio soltero, con tres hijos menores de edad , tiene por actividad económica compra, destace y venta de carne de cerdo y servicio de triciclo en su comunidad está ubicado en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante, cuenta con una experiencia de tres años , en la cual ha demostrado ser responsable, trabajador,  el financiamiento lo está solicitando para la compra de cerdos y mantenimientos del triciclo con el cual sale a verde el producto para la elaboración de nacatames, chicharrones, carne de cerdos, frito entre otros.
texts.en:
Santos Antonio is single and has three minor children. His commercial activity is the purchase, butchering, and sale of pork, and tricycle service in his community. His business is located in the house where he lives and out on the street. He has three years of experience, during which he has proved to be responsible and hardworking. 
He is requesting financing in order to purchase pigs, maintain the tricycle he uses to go out and sell his products, and prepare pork tamales, pork rinds, pork meat, fried goods, and other products.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, maintain the tricycle he uses to sell his products, and prepare pork tamales, pork meat, pork rinds, fried goods, etc.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
La Sra. Esperanza esta separada de su esposo y tiene dos hijos en edad escolar  y otra mayor que  le ayuda en el negocio.  Se ha dedicado al negocio de la venta de comida desde hace 12 años.
La Sra. Esperanza comenta que últimamente  han bajado sus ventas y por consiguiente no ha tenido ganancias por lo que solicita el préstamo para resurtir su negocio y ofrecer mayor calidad y mejor servicio así tener un mayor beneficio económico.
texts.en: Señora Esperanza is separated from her spouse and has two children who are school-aged and another who is older and helps her with the business.  She has made a living through the business of selling food for 12 years.  Señora Esperanza says that recently her sales decreased, and consequently she has not made a profit, so she asks for the loan to re-stock her business and to offer better quality and better service so that she will have greater financial benefit.

loans.use: to buy supplies for selling food.

loans.name: Xinia Mirelia

texts.es: Doña Xinia labora para un hospital desde hace 11 años, su ocupación. Medico General, ella obtendrá su primer crédito  con Afodenic ya que necesita mejorar su casa, con este financiamiento comprara  piedras, cemento, cerámica, arena,  puertas,   persianas.  Para  poder tener mejoría en la misma ya que con las lluvias a presentado ciertos  inconvenientes porque todavía no ha podido  terminarla. Ella agradece la oportunidad que Afodenic le ha dado para seguir con su sueño que es tener su casa bien construida y terminada.
texts.en: Xinia has been working in a hospital for the last 11 years as a General Practitioner. She is requesting a first loan from Afodenic because she needs to improve her house. With this loan she will buy stones, cement, tiles, sand, doors and blinds so that she can improve her house because the rains have posed a problem because she hasn't yet been able to finish it. She is grateful for the opportunity that Afodenic has given her to fulfil her dream to have her house well-built and completed.

loans.use: to buy materials for her house.

loans.name: Pedro Humberto

texts.es:
Pedro, solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio ya que desea abastecer lo de nuevos productos medicinales para salir a ofrecer a los clientes, comprando antibióticos, vitaminas, sueros, en diferentes presentaciones y para diferentes enfermedades que sus clientes puedan tener esto le ayudará para incrementar la posibilidad de venta ya que tendrá un negocio más surtido de los productos.
El tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior ya que le ayudó a crecer y tener variedad de producto, las circunstancias familiares han mejorado ya que ha recibido mejores ingresos
texts.en:
Pedro is requesting a new loan in order to stock his business with new medicinal products for his clients. He plans to purchase antibiotics and vitamins, serums, etc, that are used to treat various ailments and diseases. He hopes these products will improve the variety of products he can offer to his clients, and will help him to attend to client orders and increase his sales. 

His previous loan was very helpful, and allowed him to grow his business and diversify his stock of products, as well as to improve his family's quality of life and increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase antibiotics and vitamins.

loans.name: Milton Manuel

texts.es:
Milton, está iniciando nuevamente los trabajos agrícolas, para esto solicita un nuevo préstamo e invertirlo en los materiales como lo es el abono, insecticidas, pesticidas que son aplicados al momento de la siembra, dichos productos le ayuda a prevenir las plagas en el cultivo y le fortalecen para que su producción sea abundante.
El préstamo anterior le permitió realizar un buen trabajo, creciendo en su producción realizando ventas de las cuales han beneficiado en los ingresos a su familia.
texts.en:
Milton is sowing his crops again.  For this reason, he is requesting a new loan which he will invest in buying materials such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides.  These are applied to the crops as they are sown.  They help to avoid pests damaging his crops and strengthen the crops so that they do well.  

Milton's previous loan allowed him to do his work well and increase his production.  His sales were good and improved his family's income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is married and has one child. He operates a motorbike transportation business to earn a living. He has been in the business for six years.  He has employed one person in the business. He has grown his business since he joined Faulu Kenya because he has been trained on business management skills.  

He hopes to grow his business and employ people.  He has requested for 100,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy another motorbike.

loans.use: To buy another motorbike

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Bárbara Natacha

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Los Cerezos  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Fuerza Y Valor esta es una zona urbana marginal muy poblada y trabajadora.
 
En este lugar vive la señora Bárbara, tiene 41 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos de 24, 22, 18 y 7 años de edad, los dos menores estudia en colegio y escuela. El marido es albañil. 

Nuestra amiga es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que el gana muy poco, se dedica a la venta de sabanas, edredones, ropa y productos que tengan buena salida, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al dia, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de dos años que se dedica a esta actividad, ella utilizo el primer crédito que recibió del banco para empezar con su negocio el cual es de mucha ayuda le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa, sabanas, edredones, entre otras cosas. Lleva más de dos años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos empezó su negocio. 

Su sueño es arreglar su casa ya que aún le falta terminar.
texts.en:
The Community Bank "Fuerza Y Valor" (Strength and Courage) meets every 15 days in the zone of Los Cerezos in the city of Portoviejo. This area is urban, marginalized, hardworking and has a high population density.

Bárbara is 41 years old, and is in a civil union with four children, ages 7, 18, 22 and 24. Her younger children are in school, and her husband works as a mason.

She is a housewife who also helps out with household expenses, since her husband doesn't make very much money. She makes a living selling sheets, quilts, clothing and other products door to door. She works three days a week for two to three hours per day. She allows customers to pay on credit and collects payments from them every eight days. She has been working in sales for over two years, and she used the support from her first loan to start her business, which was very helpful.

Bárbara is requesting this loan in order to purchase clothing, sheets, quilts, etc. She has been a member of the Community Bank for over two years, and she likes being a part of group, since the resulting loans have helped her start her business.

Her dream is to complete construction on their home, which is still unfinished.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, sheets, quilts, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain the crop

loans.name: Cristobal De Jesus

texts.es:
Cristóbal, inicia una nueva temporada agrícola preparando sus tierras con todo lo necesario para esto solicita un préstamo y realizar la compra de abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, que son los insumos que le dan la fortaleza a la plantación y le previene de las plagas.
El considera que con el préstamo anterior logró salir con la cosecha siendo abundante y sana esto le ayuda a mejorar lo familiar ya que cultiva para la alimentación de ellos y para poder realizar ventas y generar los ingresos.
texts.en:
Cristóbal is beginning a new agricultural season and preparing his land with the necessary materials. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy manure, insecticides and pesticides which are the inputs which strengthen the crop and protect it from pests. 
He says that with the previous loan he managed to produce an abundant and healthy harvest which helped his family, as he cultivates his crops both to feed them and for sale to obtain an income.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Joaquin

texts.es:
Joaquín es  casado y tiene cuatro hijos que están en etapa escolar, viven en casa de sus suegros ocupando solo tres habitaciones con paredes de adobe y el piso de tierra ,la casa esta ubicada en la zona Brasil de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente trabaja como artesano costurero ya que se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir para hombres, mujeres y niños, trabaja por más de doce horas ya que él es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación, estudios, gastos médicos y servicios básicos de su familia por que su esposa se fue a trabajar al exterior y de vez en cuando le envía un poco de dinero para sus hijos.
Es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar un terreno y posteriormente construir para dar más comodidad a sus hijos para  mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Joaquín es poder construir su casa para que sus hijos se sientan seguros y tener su taller más grande para elaborar prendas en cantidad y mejorar sus ingresos.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y  KIVA.
texts.en:
Joaquín is married and has four school age children.  They live in his mother and father-in-laws’ house, occupying only three rooms with adobe walls and dirt floors.  The house is located in the Brasil area of the city of El Alto.

He currently works making clothes for men, women, and children.  He works for more than 12 hours as this is his only source of income to cover the food, education, and medical expenses and the basic services for his family.  His wife went to work abroad, and once in a while she sends him a little money for their children.

This is why he is requesting the loan to buy a piece of land.  He will later build in order to make his children more comfortable and to improve their quality of life.

Joaquín’s dream is to be able to build a house so that his children feel safe.  He also dreams of having a larger shop to make garments in quantity and improve his income.

This is the third time that he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land to start building a house for his family.

loans.name: Jimena

texts.es:
Jimena, es soltera y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en la casa de sus padres y solo ocupa dos habitaciones pequeñas, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Villa Abaroa en la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como supervisora por más de ocho horas ya que realiza contratos y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y gastos médicos ya que tampoco cuenta con un seguro.
El crédito lo solicita para la compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena, para la construcción de aulas escolares  ya que actualmente esta trabajando con un arquitecto y les pagan al finalizar la obra.
El sueño de Jimena, es mejorar sus ingresos y poder independizarse ya que desea dar más comodidad a su familia, por que no cuenta con otros ingresos para la manutención de sus hijos.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Jimena is single, and she lives with her two children in her parents’ house.  They only occupy two small rooms.  The house is located in the Villa Abaroa area in the city of La Paz.

She currently works as a supervisor of contracts for over eight hours a day.  With the little she earns she needs to cover the food, educational, and medical expenses.  She does not have insurance.

She is requesting the loan to buy bricks, cement, and sand in order to build classrooms.  She is now working with an architect, and they are paid when the work is finished.

Jimena’s dream is to improve her income and to be able to become independent.  She wishes to do this in order to make her family more comfortable.  She has no other income to support her children.

This is the second time she has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand in order to build classrooms for a contract she has together with an architect.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus tíos ocupando solo dos habitaciones pequeñas en la zona El Tejar en la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como arquitecto por más de ocho horas y realiza todo tipo de contratos en el área de la construcción, es por eso que solicita el crédito ya que debe comprar material para la construcción de aulas escolares como ser cemento, arena , ladrillos, estuco etc.  ya que le pagan una vez terminada la obra, y con el dinero  que le pagan debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, servicios básicos y gastos médicos ya que no cuenta con seguro medico.
El sueño de Juan Carlos, es mejorar sus ingresos y poder independizarse de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is single, and he does not have children.  He lives in his aunt and uncle’s house, occupying only two small rooms.  He lives in the El Tejer area in the city of La Paz.

He currently gets income working as an architect for over eight hours a day.  He does all types of contract jobs in the area of construction.  

That is why he is requesting the loan.  He needs to buy construction materials for classrooms.  He will buy materials like cement, sand, bricks, and stucco, etc.  They pay him when the job is finished.  With the money they pay him he needs to cover food expenses, basic services, and medical expenses.  He does not have medical insurance.

Juan Carlos’s dream is to improve his income and to be able to become independent.  This way he will improve his quality of life.

This is the second time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for classrooms he is contracted to build.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luís, esta casado y tiene tres hijos que están en etapa escolar, vive en casa de sus padres ocupando cuatro habitaciones pequeñas con paredes de ladrillo, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja por más de doce horas como chofer y hasta altas horas de la noche y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y servicios básicos de su familia. Es por eso que solicita el crédito para arreglar su vehículo, el cual necesita su mantenimiento de rutina y chequeo del arrancador, ya que es la única fuente de trabajo que tiene para mantener a su familia.
El sueño de José Luís es tener su casa propia para dar más comodidad a su familia y también tener un lugar donde guardar su vehiculo por las noches ya que lo deja en la puerta de su casa.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
José Luís is married and has three school age children.  He lives in his parents’ house, occupying four small rooms with brick walls.  The house is located in the Achachicala area of the city of La Paz.

He currently gets income because he works over twelve hours a day, into the late hours of the night, as a driver.  With the little that he earns he needs to cover his family’s expenses for food, education, and basic services.

That is why he is requesting the loan to fix his vehicle.  The vehicle needs routine maintenance and the starter needs to be checked.  This is his only source of work that he has to support his family.

José Luís’s dream is to have his own house in order to make his family more comfortable.  Also, he wants his own house in order to have a place to keep his vehicle at night.  He now leaves it at the door to his house.

This is the first time he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his taxi.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es un hombre de 31 años que vive en la parroquia de Belisario Quevedo en Latacunga. La ciudad de Latacunga es una ciudad pequeña de Ecuador, que durante la última época ha experimentado bastante crecimiento en sus dos industrias más importantes; la agricultura y la floricultura. Esto sin embargo ha resultado en un importante crecimiento de todas las industrias de la ciudad y su población en su gran mayoría indígena y mestiza quienes en este nuevo contexto empiezan a encontrar alternativas para crecer económica y personalmente.  Latacunga además cuenta con la peculiaridad de encontrarse peligrosamente cerca al volcán Cotopaxi, el estratovolcán activo más grande del mundo. 
Dentro de este contexto surge Juan Carlos, el actualmente es soltero, y además de encontrarse en una situación difícil de por si, donde conseguir crédito para su desarrollo ha resultado prácticamente imposible, Juan Carlos solo ha completado la primaria en sus estudios. El actualmente ya tiene un pequeño negocio que estableció hace poco más de 6 años. Juan Carlos decidió continuar con la tradición familiar y emplear todas las habilidades que le enseñaron sus tíos, personas con las que se crió para dedicarse a la producción de leche cruda de vaca y la venta de cerdos. Aunque el comienzo fue un poco difícil y lento, ahora Juan Carlos se encuentra un poco mejor establecido y  su negocio ha alcanzado cierta estabilidad. No obstante, Juan Carlos considera que ya ha llegado a un punto donde podría crecer y buscar abastecer a más personas para así mejorar sus ingresos económicos y adquirir una mejor calidad de vida para él y sus tíos quienes siempre lo han apoyado. Para esta razón Juan Carlos necesita su ayuda, el está en búsqueda de un crédito para poder comprar otra vaca, quien le ayude a elevar su producción de leche y con ello tener mejores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is a 31 year old man and currently unmarried. He lives in the Belisario Quevedo parish in Latacunga, a small city in Ecuador that during the last era experienced significant growth in its two most important industries: agriculture and floriculture. However, this has resulted in an important growth of all the city’s industries and the majority of its population are indigenous and mestizo people who are beginning to find alternatives for economic and personal growth in this new context.  In addition, Latacunga has the peculiar distinction of being located dangerously near the Cotopaxi volcano, the largest active stratovolcano in the world.

Juan Carlos emerges within this context, a difficult situation in itself, compounded by the fact that finding a source of credit has been practically impossible.  Juan Carlos only completed an elementary school education.  He already has a small business that he established more than six years ago.  Juan Carlos decided to carry on the family business and employ all of the skills taught to him by his uncles, who raised him to dedicate himself to the business of raw milk production and pig sales.   Although the beginning was a bit slow and difficult, now Juan Carlos is a bit better established and his business has achieved some stability.  However, Juan Carlos feels that he has reached a point where he would be able to grow and is looking to supply more people with his products and thus improve his income and acquire a better quality of life for him and his uncles who have always supported him.   For this reason, Juan Carlos needs your help.  He is looking for a loan to purchase another cow, which will help him raise milk production and increase his income, and allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Rubaba

texts.en:
Rubaba is a 21-year-old single woman who is very hardworking and experienced. She breeds cattle and sells milk and milk products as well as cattle for meat purposes to local butchers. Rubaba has eight years of experience in this field, thanks to her father who taught her the best way to look after cattle. 
Rubaba usually buys small cattle, raises and fattens them in 5-6 months, and resells them for a more profitable price in the local livestock bazaar. She also sells milk and yoghurt to the neighbors. Selling milk and meat brings an income of AZN 230 per month. Milk, yoghurt, and beef are very popular products in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes such as pilau (rice cooked in a seasoned broth with meat or vegetables) and dolma (stuffed vegetables), and people always use yoghurt sauce. Milk products are considered very healthy and are also present in everyday life.   
Rubaba wishes to save money to buy herself a good dowry, hence when she gets married she can buy worthy stuff in her new house. Rubaba applied for AZN 1,000 to purchase fodder and two cows (one to raise and sell and one for milk). This will be her second loan, and she has a very positive loan history.

loans.use: to buy fodder and two cows (one to raise and sell and one for milk)

loans.name: Nidia Graciela

texts.es:
La Sra. Nidia actualmente cuenta con el ingreso de un negocio de su propiedad de venta de ropa nueva, también realiza trabajos de limpieza de casa en Laredo Texas. Tienen 2 hijas que están estudiando, una de ellas estudia psicología y la otra va a terminar la preparatoria y la mayor esta casada y tiene una estética en el domicilio de la Sra. Nidia.
Se aproxima la graduación de la hija menor de preparatoria y es un gasto fuerte al igual que el pago de inscripción a la universidad, pago de la entrega de papeles en la preparatoria, artículos escolares nuevos, Con el pago de los gastos escolares antes mencionados la hija de la Sra. Nidia podrá continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Nidia currently earns income from her business selling new clothes and also from cleaning homes in Laredo, Texas.  She has two daughters, one of whom is studying psychology and another who is about to graduate from high school.  The older daughter is married and has a beauty salon in Nidia's house.

Her younger daughter's graduation is approaching, and this is a major expense.  There are also many expenses relating to entering the university, such as entry fees, having her high school records sent to the university, and new school supplies.  When these expenses are paid for, Nidia's daughter will be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay high school graduation and college expenses.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica  a la producción de pan trabajando por más de diez horas ya que cuenta con un horno en su casa, ella es casada y tiene tres hijos que están en etapa escolar, viven en casa propia en la cual ocupan dos habitaciones pequeñas de adobe y con el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona 
San Roque de la ciudad de El Alto. Es por eso que solicita el crédito para la compra de  paja  y pago al albañil para la construcción de un par de  habitaciones que, aunque rústicas,  darán  más comodidad a su  familia, y de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño que tiene Justina, es tener su vehiculo para repartir los panes que elaboran y mejorar sus ingresos para poder pagar los estudios de sus hijos.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Justina currently gets income from making bread.  She works over ten hours a day, and she has an oven in her house.  She is married and has three school age children.  They live in their own house, occupying two small adobe rooms with dirt floors.  The house is located in the San Roque area of the city of El Alto.

This is why she is requesting the loan to buy straw and to pay the bricklayer to build a pair of rooms.  Even though they are very rustic, they will make her family more comfortable.  This will improve their quality of life.

Justina’s dream is to have a vehicle in order to deliver the bread she makes and improve her income.  She wants to do this in order to pay for her children’s education.

This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy straw and to pay the bricklayer to build a pair of rooms.

loans.name: Cecilia Dianney

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Los Cerezos  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Fuerza Y Valor esta es una zona urbana marginal muy poblada y trabajadora.
 
En este lugar conocimos a la señora Cecilia, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres de ellos ya mayores de edad, la menor tiene 15 años,  estudian en colegio y es la única que  aun vive con ella. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.

Nuestra amiga es una muy buena esposa y ama de casa que para ayudar a su marido realiza el crédito para que él lo utilice en su negocio el mismo que es el sostén de toda la familia, nos cuenta nuestra amiga que el esposo tiene un pequeño puesto en una vía de acceso muy traficada, allá dia a dia el se dedica a la venta de agua de coco, sodas, jugos y agua natural, él lleva con este negocio cerca de 8 años con el cual ha podido llevar el pan todos los días a su hogar.

Este crédito es para comprar cocos, sodas, aguas y otros productos que el vende. Ella lleva desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le han dado con los créditos para salir adelante.
 
Sus sueños  son seguir adelante  y darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
The Fuerza Y Valor Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the Los Cerezos neighborhood of the city of Portoviejo.  This area is urban, low-income, heavily populated, and hardworking.

This is where we met Cecilia.  She is 45 years old, married, and has four children, three of whom are adults; her youngest is 15 years old, attends high school, and is the only one who still lives with her.  Her husband is a shopkeeper.
 
Our friend is a very good wife and homemaker who is taking out this loan to help her husband.  He will use it for his business, which is what supports their family.  She tells us that her husband has a small stand on a high-traffic access road where he sells coconut water, sodas, and water every day.  He has had this business for eight years and because of it he has been able to bring bread home every day.

This loan is to buy coconuts, sodas, waters, and other products he sells.  She has been with this communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans have always helped her to get ahead.

Her dreams are to get ahead and to give her daughter the best.

loans.use: Comprar cocos, sodas, aguas, etc.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 67 años y se encuentra casada con Antero, de momento no tiene hijos a su cargo porque todos son mayores de edad. Vive en Libertad su casa es de construcción mixta y es aquí donde tiene ubicada su tienda de abarrotes. Empezó el negocio hace 5 años atrás vendiendo pocos artículos desde la sala de su domicilio pero como poco a poco fueron teniendo clientela decidieron ampliar en l parte delantera de su casa el local. Ahora les va muy bien y venden varios productos. Juana nos comenta que lo más vendido es las colas, arroz, azúcar y víveres que compran en el mercado mayorista. Junto a su esposo quien le ayuda en el manejo de la tienda abren todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche. Ella nos comenta que está muy satisfecha de que su tienda de resultados y sobre todo la ayuda de su esposo porque como está un poco enferma no se preocupa ya que él conoce el manejo de la misma. Espera con el préstamo comprar más mercadería para surtir el local y así dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Su meta a futuro es poder terminar la construcción de su casa de cemento.
texts.en:
Juana is 67 years old and is married to Antero. Her children are grown up and have left home so she currently has no dependents. She lives in Libertad in a house of mixed construction where she has her grocery store. She started the business 5 years ago selling a few items from the living room in her house but as her clientele grew little by little they decided to expand the business into the front of the house. Now it is going very well and they sell various products. Juana tells us that the products she sells most are colas, rice, sugar and supplies which they buy at a wholesalers. Together with her husband who helps her to run the shop, they open every day from 7am until 8pm. She tells us that she is very satisfied that her shop is working well and above all with her husband's help as she is a little sick but she doesn't worry because her husband knows how to manage the shop. 
With this loan she hopes to buy more merchandise to stock the shop and provide a better service to her customers. Her aim for the future is to be able to finish building her cement house.

loans.use: to buy colas, rice, sugar and supplies.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan, actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica  a la venta de artefactos eléctricos en la ciudad de El Alto trabajando por más de ocho horas al día; también tiene otros ingresos ya que los fines de semana por las noches trabaja como transportista por más de ocho horas ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y gastos médicos de su familia  que no cuentan con seguro medico.
El crédito lo necesita para comprar más artefactos eléctricos, como ser planchas eléctricas, teléfonos celulares y otros para posteriormente venderlos para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida ya que actualmente vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de adobe y el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona 16 de Julio en la ciudad de El Alto.
El sueño de Juan, es independizarse y terminar sus estudios ya que solo estudió hasta la secundaria.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Juan currently earns money selling electrical appliances in the city of El Alto.  He works more than eight hours a day.  He also has other income because on the week-ends he works more than eight hours at night as a driver.  He does this because he needs to cover his family’s food and medical expenses.  They do not have medical insurance.

He needs the loan to buy electrical appliances like electric irons, cells phones, and others.  He will then sell them to improve his income and his quality of life.  He currently lives in his parents’ house, occupying only one room with adobe walls and a dirt floor.  The house is located in the 16 de Julio area of the city of El Alto.

Juan’s dream is to become independent and to finish his studies.  He only attended school up to high school. 

It is the first time that he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy electrical appliances like electric irons, cells phones, and others to sell in the city of El Alto.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Simón,  es casado y tiene tres hijos con los cuales vive en una casa en anticretico ocupando cinco habitaciones pequeñas con paredes de ladrillo, la casa esta ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió solamente hasta la secundaria, actualmente percibe ingresos vendiendo productos de plástico ya sean platos, tasas, pocillos, etc. Trabajando más de diez horas al día  ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y estudios de sus hijos. Es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar mayor cantidad de productos de plástico y mejorar sus ingresos para mantener a su familia.
El sueño de Simón, es tener su casa propia para dar más comodidad a su familia y mejorar sus ingresos para poder cubrir los gastos de la universidad de sus hijos.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Simón is married and has three children.  They live in a house under an “anticretico” (a contract to rent property whereby the renter pays the landlord a fixed sum at the start of the rental period in lieu of paying monthly rent; at the end of the rental period, the tenant receives the sum back, in full, from the landlord, thus resulting in rent-free living).  They occupy five small rooms with brick walls.  The house is located in the city of La Paz.

He only attended school up to high school.  He currently earns income by selling plastic products like plates and cups, etc.  He works over ten hours a day because he needs to cover the food and educational expenses for his children.

That is why he is requesting the loan to buy a greater quantity of plastic products.  That way he will improve his income in order to support his family.

Simón’s dream is to have his own house in order to make his family more comfortable.  He also dreams of improving his income in order to be able to cover his children’s college education.

This is the second time that he has worked with IMPRO and the second time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of plastic products like cups and plates, etc.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Edwin es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en una casa alquilada ocupando tres habitaciones con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la misma se encuentra ubicada en la zona San Isidro de la ciudad de La Paz.
Edwin estudió solo hasta la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que elabora y vende comida a contrato en diferentes empresas, trabajando por más de diez horas al día ya que con esto debe cubrir sus gastos de alquiler , alimentación y servicios básicos.
El crédito lo solicita para la compra de una motocicleta ya que le será de mucha ayuda para repartir los pedidos de comida y de forma rápida.
El sueño de Edwin, es terminar sus estudios y hacer un curso especializado en comida internacional y tener su propio local de comidas para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Edwin is single, and he does not have children.  He lives in a rented house, occupying three rooms with brick walls and dirt floors.  The house is located in the San Isidro area of the city of La Paz.

Edwin only attended school up until high school.  He currently earns income making and selling food by contracts with different businesses.  He works over ten hours a day.  With this income he needs to cover his expenses for rent, food, and basic services.

He is requesting the loan to buy a motorcycle.  This will be a big help to him delivering the food orders, and he will do it rapidly.

Edwin’s dream is to finish his studies and to take a specialized course in international food.  He also dreams of having his own location for food in order to improve his income and his quality of life.

This is the first time he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to deliver food orders he makes at home.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
Enrique es casado y tiene tres hijos con los cuales vive en la zona San Juan de la ciudad de La Paz, en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra.
Actualmente trabaja por más de diez horas realizando todo tipo de trabajos como cerrajero, albañil y realiza instalaciones de agua y luz ya que él es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación, educación y servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo solicita es para la compra de una maquina mezcladora y motor para guinche (guinche es el nombre que se da al cable que se usa para remolcar o jalar cosas pesadas) para alivianar su trabajo ya que el material que debe manejar es muy pesado.
El sueño de Enrique es mejorar sus ingresos para comprarse una casa y dar más comodidad a su familia.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Enrique is married and has three children.  They live in the San Juan area of the city of La Paz.  They live in his parents’ house, occupying only one room with brick walls and a dirt floor.

He currently works over ten hours a day doing all types of jobs like those of a locksmith and a bricklayer.  He also does water and electrical installations.  He is the only one who covers his family’s expenses for food, education, and basic services.

He is requesting the loan to buy a cement mixer and a motor for a “guinche” (guinche is the name given to the cable that is used to tow or pull heavy things).  This will lighten his work load as the material he needs to handle is very heavy.

Enrique’s dream is to improve his income in order to buy a house and make his family more comfortable.

This is the second time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a cement mixer and a motor for a “guinche".

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria, es casada y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en una casa alquilada ocupando solo tres habitaciones, la misma que se encuentra ubicada en la zona Villa Copacabana de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica a la comercialización de ropa para varones, mujeres y niños, trabajando por más diez horas de forma ambulante ya que no cuenta con un puesto fijo, con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, alquiler y servicios básicos de su familia ya que no cuenta con otros ingresos.
El crédito lo solicita para la compra ropa por cantidad ya que desea aumentar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Maria es tener su casa propia para tener más comodidad y de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Maria is married and has two children.  They live together in a rented house, occupying only three rooms.  The house is located in the Villa Copacabana area of the city of La Paz.

She currently gets income from selling clothes for men, women, and children.  She works over ten hours a day in an itinerant manner because she does not have a fixed stand.  With the little she earns she needs to cover her family’s food, rent, and basic services expenses.  She does not have any other income.  

She is requesting the loan to buy clothes in large quantity because she wishes to increase her income.

Maria’s dream is to have her own house in order to be more comfortable and to improve her quality of life.

This is the second time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ivone

texts.es:
Ivone, es madre soltera y tiene una hija pequeña con la cual vive en casa de sus padres ocupando dos habitaciones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.
Ella, estudio solamente hasta la secundaria y actualmente trabaja como empleada por más de ocho horas en una empresa pública de la ciudad de La Paz y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y servicios básicos de su hija ya que es el único ingreso que tiene.
El crédito lo requiere para la refacción de su vivienda ya que las paredes se encuentran muy desgastadas y necesita dar más seguridad a su hija. Necesitará comprar estuco, ladrillos y pintura y pagar al albañil.
El sueño de Ivone, es mejorar sus ingresos y  poder independizarse para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hija.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Ivone is a single mother.  She has a young daughter with whom she lives.  They live in her parents’ house, occupying two rooms.  The house is located in the San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.

She only attended school up to high school.  She currently works over eight hours a day as an employee for a public company in the city of La Paz.  With the little that she earns she needs to cover the expenses for food and basic services for her daughter.  This is the only income that she has.

She needs the loan to repair her house.  The walls are in bad shape, and she needs to make her daughter safer.  She will need to buy plaster, bricks, and paint.  She will also need to pay the bricklayer.

Ivone’s dream is to improve her income and to be able to become independent.  She wants to do this to improve her quality of life and that of her daughter.

This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy plaster, bricks, and paint and to pay the bricklayer.

loans.name: Giovanni

texts.es:
Giovanni, es soltero y tiene dos hijos pequeños con los cuales vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación pequeña con piso de tierra, la misma se encuentra ubicada en la zona Villa Copacabana de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como guía turístico por más de diez horas al día, con mayor asiduidad los fines de semana ya que realiza viajes con servicio de guía completo.
El crédito lo requiere para la construcción de cabañas para llevar turistas y de esta forma mejorar sus ingresos, para la manutención de sus hijos, ya que él es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación, estudios y servicios básicos de su familia.
El sueño de Giovanni, es tener su casa propia para dar más comodidad a sus hijos para mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Giovanni is single, and he has two young children.  They live in his parents’ house, occupying only one small room with a dirt floor.  The house is located in the Villa Copacabana in the city of La Paz.

He currently gets income working as a tourist guide for over ten hours a day.  On the week-ends he works more assiduously making trips with complete guide services.

He needs the loan to build the cabins where he will take the tourists.  This way he will improve his income to support his children.  He is the only one who covers his family’s food, education, and basic services expenses.

Giovanni’s dream is to have his own house.  He wants this in order to make his children more comfortable and to improve their quality of life.

This is the first time he has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build cabins for tourists.

loans.name: Epifania

texts.es:
Epifania, es casada y tiene dos hijos pequeños con los cuales vive en la casa de su madre, ocupando solo dos habitaciones pequeñas que tienen paredes de adobe y el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona 25 de julio de la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella solo tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta la secundaria y actualmente obtiene ingresos ya que se dedica  a la venta de comida en un puestito en la calle ya que no cuenta con un lugar fijo para poder vender la comida, ella  trabaja por más de ocho horas, también obtiene ingresos del trabajo que realiza su esposo como conductor ya que ambos deben cubrir los gastos de alimentación, estudios y gastos médicos de su familia ya que tampoco cuentan con seguro medico.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar una heladera y poner a la venta refrescos y mejorar la atención a sus clientes para obtener más ingresos. 
El sueño que tiene Epifania, es tener su casa propia para dar más seguridad a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que la cliente solicita crédito en IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Epifania is married and has two young children.  She lives with them in her mother’s house, occupying only two small rooms that have adobe walls and dirt floors.  The house is located in the 25 de Julio area of the city of La Paz.

She only had the opportunity to attend school up to high school.  She currently gets income from selling food from a little stand on the street.  She does not have a fixed place to be able to sell the food.  She works for over eight hours a day.  She also gets income from her husband’s work as a driver.  They both need to cover the food, education, and medical expenses for their family.  They do not have medical insurance.

The loan she is requesting is to buy a refrigerator to sell soft drinks and improve the service for her customers.  She will do this to get more income.

Epifania’s dream is to have her own house in order to make her family safer and to improve their quality of life.

This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator to sell soft drinks at her food stand.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes es divorciada y tiene tres hijas de las cuales dos están en etapa escolar, viven en dos habitaciones en alquiler en la zona Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja por más de ocho horas como empleada de limpieza en una entidad pública, también lava ropa los fines de semana para tener más ingresos ya que es la única que aporta en alimentación, estudios y pago de alquiler de su familia.
El crédito lo solicita para poder pagar los estudios de sus hijas ya que con lo poco que gana no le alcanza ni para poder comprar sus útiles.
El sueño de Lourdes es tener su casa propia para poder descansar en el pago de alquileres ya que el trabajo que realiza es muy sacrificado más que todo en tiempos de frió.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Lourdes is divorces and has three daughters.  Two of them are school age.  They live in two rented rooms in the Tembladerani area of the city of La Paz.

She currently gets income from working over eight hours a day as a cleaning employee of a public entity.  She also washes clothes on the week-ends in order to have more income.  She is the only one who supports her family’s expenses for food, education, and rent.

The loan she is requesting is to be able to pay for her daughters’ education.  With the small amount she makes she does not even have enough to buy supplies.

Lourdes’s dream is to have her own home.  She wants to be able to stop paying rent.  The work she does is very difficult, especially when it is cold.

This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her children.

loans.name: Denisa

texts.es:
Denisa es una joven de 30 años, es muy entusiasta y trabajadora, vive al lado de su esposo con quien tiene un pequeño de 9 años de edad el cual es su adoración y su razón de vivir y por quien trabaja día a día para poder brindarle junto a su esposo una vida de calidad y sobre todo mucha humildad. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Camaná, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, playas hermosas, se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz el cual es conocido por ser uno de los mejores del mundo, también se desarrolla la pesca y también la ciudad es muy conocida por el famoso chupe de Camarones.  Cuando tiene un tiempito libre a Denisa le gusta mucho pasear con su familia sobre todo para compartir juntos momentos de distracción, asimismo le gusta preparar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo pescado Frito. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Día a día Denisa trabaja en su negocio de venta de lencería (ropa interior), ella trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es ofrece productos de buena calidad.

Denisa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como prendas interiores, pijamas para invierno, pantuflas, entre otros, así de esta manera tendrá mas productos para ofrecer a sus cliente sy mejorara su ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando y trabajando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Denisa is 30 years old, and she is a very enthusiastic and hardworking young woman. She lives with her husband, and together they have a nine-year-old little boy, who is her pride and joy and her reason to live. For him she works day after day, so that she and her husband can offer him a quality life and, most of all, humility. Their home is located in the city of Camaná, which is a city known for its warm weather, lovely beaches, and agriculture. Particularly, the rice grown here is known to be one of the best in the world. There is also fishing, and the city is also renowned for its famous shrimp "chupe." When she has a little free time, Denisa enjoys going out with her family, especially to share moments of leisure together. She also enjoys preparing one of her favorite dishes, which is a delicious fried fish. Due to her limited financial means, she only went to high school, but she would have liked to earn a degree at university.

Day after day, Denisa works in her business, which sells lingerie (underwear). She works there about 10 hours a day, and may serve up to 30 customers during the day. She believes her business is going well because she is very nice to her customers and, most of all, because she offers them good quality products.

Denisa is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because the help they have offered her will allow her to purchase more merchandise for her business, such as undergarments, winter pajamas, slippers, and other items. This way, she will have more products to offer her customers and her income will improve. This will allow her to keep fighting and working every day to make her greatest dream come true: to give her children a good education.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Viviana Vanessa

texts.es: Viviana de 27 años vive en Quevedo junto a sus hijos. Es madre soltera por lo que vive con sus padres para poder afrontar su situación económica. Sus hijos tienen 10 y 7 años y asisten a la escuela fiscal de la ciudad. Viviana se dedica hace 10 años a la venta ambulante de mochilas, carteras y perritos de felpa bailarines. Empezó el negocio porque se considera una persona muy responsable y como tenía a su cargo a sus hijos necesitaba darles una estabilidad económica. Ella nos comenta que es duro porque recorre sin parar las calles con lluvia o sol, sin importar las inclemencias del tiempo para poder vender sus productos. El trabajo lo realiza desde las 7:30 luego de dejar a sus hijos en la escuela y regresa a las 5 de la tarde. Nos comenta que lo hace sola a veces la acompaña su hijo mayor pero prefiere dejarlo en casa ya que las calles son peligrosas. También le preocupa la delincuencia porque si le roban la dejarían sin su fuente de ingreso. Con el crédito que solicita comprara mercadería para vender como corazones de felpa, peluches, carteras y blusas. Desea en un futuro tener su casa propia con un negocio estable para que sus hijos tengan un futuro seguro.
texts.en: Twenty-seven-year-old Viviana lives in Quevedo with her children.  She is a single mother, so she lives with her parents in order to deal with her financial situation.  Her children are 10 and 7 years old and they attend the city's public school.  For 10 years now Viviana has been a street vendor, selling backpacks, wallets, and little dancing stuffed animals.  She started her business because she considers herself to be a very responsible person and as she had to take care of her children, she needed to provide them with financial stability.  She tells us that it is hard because she walks up and down the streets nonstop, rain or shine, no matter what the inclemency of the weather, in order to sell her products.  She starts work at 7:30 after dropping her kids off at school and she gets back at 5:00 in the afternoon.  She tells us that she does it on her own, or sometimes with her older son, but she prefers to leave him at home because the streets are dangerous.  She also worries about crime because if she were robbed, she would be left with no source of income.
