With the loan she is requesting, she will buy merchandise to sell, such as plush heart, stuffed animals, wallets, and blouses.  In the future, she would like to have her own home with a stable business so that her children will have a secure future.

loans.use: corazones de felpa, peluches, carteras y blusas

loans.name: Lola Mercedes

texts.es: Lola vive con su familia en la casa de sus padres en Quevedo. Tiene 32 años y se dedica a la venta de ropa, sabanas y edredones. Lola nos cuenta que empezó con la venta de perfumes lo cual le generaba rentabilidad, poco a poco empezó a reunir dinero y decidió invertirlo comprando blusas, vestidos y ropa de niños. Desde que empezó a vender este tipo de productos y obteniendo mejores resultados ya que tiene más cliente y de seguir así espera crecer mucho. El trabajo lo realiza sola recorriendo el sector y visitando a sus clientes. Lola nos menciona que empieza desde muy temprano ya que sus hijos viven con sus padres y su mamá se los cuida cuando regresan de la escuela. El préstamo que solicita Lola es para comprar mercadería y tener en stock. Su sueño que espera no sea imposible es abrir un local en su casa propia para darle comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Lola lives with her family in her parents' house in Quevedo. She is 32 years old and makes a living selling clothing, sheets and quilts. Lola started her business just selling perfume, and little by little she was able to earn and save money, and she eventually decided to invest in the purchase of blouses, dresses and kids' clothing. Since she started selling a wider variety of products, she has seen significant improvements in her business and has been able to increase her customer base. 

She travels around the area selling products and visiting her clients. Lola starts work very early, since her children live with her parents and her mother takes care of them when they get home from school. Lola is requesting this loan in order to purchase more merchandise and have a good variety of products in stock. Her dream is to open her own store out of her house so that she can spend more time with her family.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, dresses and kids' clothing.

loans.name: Santos Alberto

texts.es:
Don Santos tiene la edad de 37 años, tiene su pequeño negocio de alquiler de cuartos, casado, y padre de dos hijos. El ha venido mejorando su casa con sus propios ingresos, siendo de oficio mecanico.
Hoy en dia desea hacer los cuartos con paredes de concreto, teniendo mejor comodidad yprivacidad para su familia. esto ha sido posible a corto plazo por financiamiento otorgado. para esto comprara bloques, arena, cemento, hierro y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Santos is 37 years old and is married with two children. He has a small business renting rooms. He has been improving his house with his own income, as he is a mechanic by trade. 
Now he would like to make concrete walls in the bedrooms to give his family greater comfort and privacy. This has been possible in the short term with the loan granted. He will use it to buy blocks, sand, cement and iron in order to begin the work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as blocks, sand, cement and iron to improve his house.

loans.name: Bertha Claudia

texts.es: Bertha Claudia tiene 44 años, soltera, con un hijo menor de edad, su actividad es la venta de hot dog, hamburguesa, gaseosas y cosméticos, tiene seis años de tener el negocio, La mayoría de sus clientes llegan a disfrutar de sus diferentes productos, inicio este negocio por su esposo que fue quien le ayudo con el poco capital de trabajo compraron ciertos productos y fue así que lograron observar que establecer este tipo de negocios es muy rentable. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de bolsas, pan, carne, salchichas, sopas, gaseosas, jugos, entre otras cosas.  Desea que su hijo sea un profesional y logre obtener un buen trabajo
texts.en:
Bertha Claudia is 44 years old.  She is single and has one dependent child.  Bertha Claudia's business is selling hot dogs, burgers, soda and cosmetics.  She has been in this business for six years.  Her customers enjoy the different products that she offers.

Bertha Claudia started this business with some working capital that her husband provided.  They bought some products and realized that this type of business is very profitable.  The loan that Bertha Claudia is requesting will be used to buy bags, bread, meat, sausages, soups, soda, juice and other products.  She would like her son to become a professional and secure a good job.

loans.use: to buy bags, bread, meat, sausages, soup, soda, juice, etc.
